fields.verse 3: [A]Kei sin in hmuh na duh [E]mi na hmuh[D]lo mi umsual [A]maw? dawtank lo cun [E]kei nih cun [D]pek khawh ding zei[A]dang ka ngeilo, Zaangtan tan awk [E]tha tunglo, [D]nang co ding khua[A]tlai ai cang, lungfak in na [E]tuar ve hnga maw? [D]zungzal kan [A]danghram lai hi
fields.chorus: [A]Ruun inn sang kai dingah / [A]inn leng lai ka ti ah na pa ral ka tih, a [E]ruang cu ka hngal lo, santlailo ka [A]si, dawtnak cu an mertak, lungrep ngeilo leng / Parcel thawng theih cun, [E]chawi le per an i tim hmuhlo tluang [A]dangah, huhu..haha kei hlei dawtu na [E]ton cun, hung ka chimthan mu ka chambau ko ka ti [A]lai..

fields.title: Ka Phuang Ngamlo
fields.verse 1: [D]Leicung ah ka [A]dawt, nang [G]lawng hi kei ka ca[D]ah ka voikhat hmuhnak [F#m]in [Em]thinlung chungah na [A]cam, kei ka [D]ca'h na dawh khun [A]ko, tlang [G]cung pardawt te [D]bang, val [A]kip nih tawh tim hna..
fields.verse 2: [D]Zaan khua tlai ah kei lawng[A]in, khua[G]za ka ruah zawn[D]ah, na sinah kan dawtnak [F#m]bia phuan [Em]ding kaa tim tawn [A]ee, siseh [D]nang na hmai phak [A]cun phuan [G]ngam nih si tung[D]lo lung[A]kil te lawng in maw?
fields.verse 3: [D]Rual hawi dawtnak lawng [A]cun, a tling [G]kho lo kei ka ca[D]ah, lungkil thli te dawt[F#m]mi na [Em]rak si ruangah [A]maw? ka hmur[D]ka in ka phuang ngam[A]lo ka aa[G]ka zaihla tal [D]in phuang [A]ve cang ning ka dawt,
fields.chorus: [D]Pardawh, vaal [A]dang kut in uai sual [Bm]lai ti ka [F#m]phang, zaan ih [G]meremlo mit[D]thlam ah na cuang [A]ee, kaa [D]thim, lung[A]kil in [Bm]theihthiam um te hnga [F#m]maw? nang he [G]dawtnak bia phai[A]ti um te hnga [D]maw?
fields.ending chorus: Ka phuang [G]ngamlo kei [A]lungchung dawtnak [D]bia,nang he [G]dawtnak bia phang[A]ti um te hnga [D]maw?

fields.title: Thir Le Daar
fields.verse 1: [D]Voidang bang [A]kan ton hoi than, [G]hi zalam cung[D]ah, [Bm]aa thlengthiam tunglo nang bang [F#m]kan lenti tonnak zalam [Bm]cu, [G]dawtnak kha dawtnak nih [A]tlam a tlinhlo hnu cun, ka [A7]tummi dawtnak ka nganh [Bm]ee,
fields.verse 2: [D]Kan lam ai [A]then ai, ka dawt a [G]fawilo kei [D]ca'h, [Bm]nichuah ka zoh, nitlak na zoh, [F#m]kutsih lengti ding sithiam tung[Bm]lo, [G]santlailo val hrat cu [A]dawtnak ti lo cun, [A7]tuahsernak in kei ka tlinh kho [Bm]lo...
fields.chorus: [D]Dawtnak in sak[A]mi ka thinlung, [Bm]chawva in khat [F#m]mi na thinlung, [G]kei nih dawtnak cu ka [D]pom, [Em]nang nih chawva na pom [A]ve, [D]dawtnak ka lung, [A]chawva na lung, [Bm]kan thenning [A]aa dan hnu [G]cun thir le daar bang kan tian [D]lai, [A]zeiti awk [D]tha...
fields.ending chorus: [D]Dawtnak in sak[A]mi ka thinlung, [Bm]chawva in khat [F#m]mi na thinlung, [G]kei nih dawtnak cu ka [D]pom, [Em]nang nih chawva na pom [A]ve, [D]dawtnak ka lung, [A]chawva na lung, [Bm]kan thenning [A]aa dan hnu [G]cun thir le daar bang kan tian [D]lai, [A]zeiti awk [D]tha..

fields.title: Thih Tiang In maw
fields.verse 1: [B]Doral lian bang kan kar i, then [A]zai an rel hnu [B]cun, lungthin fah ka tuar kho lo, nang [A]lo cun caan tawi [B]hmanh, a har ee kei ka caah dawt[A]mi zuun cuai ding [G#]cu, [B]awh... [F#]aw... [E]lei nun zuamlo ka [F#]tuar ee kei lawng [B]in...
fields.verse 2: [B]Ka siam a kim kho hrim lo, nang [A]lo cun nunnem [B]aw, kei tangah a cam peng ee, zung[A]zal in na rim [B]hmui, a fak ee kei caah cun cu [A]ngai kan danghram [G#]cu [B]awwh..[F#]aw  z[E]eizong fah hngallo ka [E]tuar ee kekkuai [B]in...
fields.chorus: Kei [E]nak sang dawtu [F#]ngei in lunglawm [E]in va leng hmanh [B]law, kan [G#m]ven peng lai,ka [F#]mitsir thli tal [B]cun...  [F#].., a [E]zualter chin ee lamt[F#]on zawnah, lungfah[E]nak a [B]zor kho lo, thih [E]tiangin maw nang [F#]zun ka uaipi [B]lai...

fields.title: Thentu Kut
fields.verse 1: [C]Kei lungchung uam mi bia hna [Dm]phuang ve cang ning, [F]theithiam ve cang ka tuarnak [C]hi, then lai ding cun timtuahnak [Dm]ka rak ngeilo, [F]fak khun ka [G]tuar na liam hnu [C]ah..
fields.verse 2: [C]Philh sual hin hlah mu hlan kan [Dm]tuanbia sung, [F]liam tuan in smpuak cawi hnu [C[Dm]]zong, kei ka ca'h partha dang par [Dm]ve hna hmanhseh, [F]lung kai her [G]rih lai na sin[C]ah...
fields.verse 3: [C]Hnulei chit in ka liamtak [Dm]ko cang hmanhlaw, [F]liam siaherh ve mu kei ca[C]ah, thinlung chung dawtnak kei ca'h [Dm]kaltak in n[F]a liam hi [G]kai lungsak khun [C]ee
fields.chorus: [F]Kutsih in kan lenti lio[C]ah, [Dm]ho lengnu kut maw kana kar [G]ah, [F]kaa lunghmuihpi khunmi [C]pardawh te cu [Dm]liampi ai [G]cang hna mitthli [C]he...

fields.title: Chimthli Men Nih
fields.verse 1: [E]Ka ruatsual hlah law, zun chimthli aw, sung[A]khun dawtmi hlei cun, [C#m]ho sin vaivuanh ding cun run ka chim hlah, ruah [A]nolh than a har ai ee, a [B]hmun a fek thiang dawt[A]nak hi dawtmi na [E]ca'h,
fields.verse 2: [E]Dawtnak in thuamh kei ka thinlung, [A]thennak nih a zul lai lai, ka [C#m]tumtah mi dawtnak sung phanh hlan ah, zei [A]nih an kham kho lai lo, a [B]hmun a fek dawtnak [A]he ka dawt nang na [E]sinah..
fields.verse 3: [E]Dawtnak in thuamh kei ka thinlung, [A]thennak nih a zul lai lai, ka [C#m]tumtah mi dawtnak sung phanh hlan ah, zei [A]nih an kham kho lai lo, a [B]hmun a fek dawtnak [A]he ka dawt nang na [E]sinah...
fields.chorus: [A]Thennak chimthli aw dawtnak ka hneksak hlah, hram[E]fek cia dawtnak ee, na [A]hrawk kho lai lo, chawih tawn favai bangin [B]khin, tian [A]dingin cun chim[B]thli aw ruatsual [C#m]hlah..

fields.title: I Lungsak Ko ning
fields.verse 1: [F]Ka lungchung bia [Bb]hi phuan caan [F]a um te [C]hnga maw? [Bb]dawtmi na [F]sinah, nang lo danghram fah hi tintling [C]cung merem [F]kho hrim lo..  . .[C..]
fields.verse 2: [F]Santlailo ka [Bb]si ca'h [Bb]maw, sunghno [C]nu le [Bb]pa lung [F]ka tlinglo, siseh [Bb]lungtak dawt[F]nak ngeitu [C]ka si, velhle [F]aanka thiamlo..[C]
fields.verse 3: [F]Kei i ka [Bb]hnangamnak [F]le ka lawmh[C]nak bik [Bb]cu nangmah [F]lawnglawng, siseh hmuh[Bb]sung ton har [F]aw, kan phul[C]o ee, santlai[F]lo leng nih..[C].
fields.chorus: Ka dawt nang [F]le kei kan biak [A]zingnu [Dm]nih samhri kan [Gm]sihlo ruangah [Bb]maw si [C]hnga? i [Bb]lungsak [F]ko ning [A]na far santlai[Dm]lo,  par[Bb]tha dang [C]tawt cang [F]mu..
fields.ending chorus: Ka dawt nang [F]le kei kan biak [A]zingnu [Dm]nih samhri kan [Gm]sihlo ruangah [Bb]maw si [C]hnga? i [Bb]lungsak [F]ko ning [A]na far santlai[Dm]lo,  par[Bb]tha dang [C]tawt cang [F]mu.

fields.title: Zan Tim Mitthli
fields.verse 1:
[F]Tluang in cung zingnu nih kan hruai hram sehlaw ee, [Am]zungzal khundim [Dm]ti ding kan ruah lio ah zei [Bb]bia hen rung phuang [F]hna, [Gm]kan tummi vai bang [C]tio dih ai ee, ka [Bb]celh hnga maw? zan[C]tim mitthli luan [F]zungzal lai hi..

 [F]Aanka bia na cah ta ka theih zawh ah cun ee, [Am]mitthli dil nih zei[Dm]zong phen mitcaw bang, [Bb]sihmanhseh rual hawi [F]hmai ah, [Gm]ka tap ngamlo maw [G]a fah hringhran, [Bb]tuar har khun in zan[C]tim lawng tahngam lai [f]hi..
fields.verse 2: [F]Zuunngaih ah van va te hun cah lang tum lio ah, [Am]ka lung mawl in [Dm]ka hlau ai dah ngai na [Bb]thlei thawng nih vantek [F]bang, [Gm]sawksam dih ai kan [C]tumtah runin, zam[Bb]tim lawng [C]maw, kei ka co [F]tawk si hnga?
fields.chorus: [Dm]Zantim mitthli....[C],   [Am]zantim mitthli ..[C], [F]tiamcia tintling [C]ciapter ai mu, [Dm]zamtim mitthli..[C]..., [Am]zantim, [Bb]zantim mit[F]thli...
fields.ending chorus: [Dm]Zantim mitthli....[C],   [Am]zantim mitthli ..[C], [F]tiamcia tintling [C]ciapter ai mu, [Dm]zamtim mitthli..[C]..., [Am]zantim, [Bb]zantim mit[F]thli...

fields.title: Ka Khen Lung Thli Tum
fields.singer: P. Thawng Bawi, Dawt Hlei Hniang
fields.verse 1:
[G]Lungthli ka tum ka khen cang, [D]dawt nuhniang sin[G]ah, [Am]khuaitizu thlum [D]khat partha, rimhmui ka par[G]dawh, tlengkhat thu van va bang khin, zungzal lengti u[C]sih, ka tar hnu ka [G]sam par tiang, [D]kan dawt lai bia kaa [G]kam, 

 [G]Nang biakamnak ka zumh ee, [D]valtha tahniang [G]aw, [Am]zumh le bochan [D]awk na tlak dawtmi kei ca[G]ah, kei lungthin le kan dawtnak kan pek ee dihlak [C]in chantlung chanchuak [G]tiangin ee, [D]kan dawt lai bia kaa [G]kam...
fields.verse 2:
[G]Dawt aw ka tangnem cungah [D]in pom ta rih [G]ning, [Am]panh chialmal mit[D]hmai dawh te, zoh ka cim hrim[G]lo, kei ca'h zungzal theithiamtu van ngaknu dawh na [C]si, partha pardawh [G]vialte lak, [D]kei caah naa dawh [G]khun..

 [G]Lung hnangamnak a tling khun, [D]dawtmi tangnem [G]ah [Am]velhle tello na [D]dawtnak kei ca'h an thlum [G]khun, cung i a ceu fidi lei thing hnahchawl hna [C]nih, kan dawtnak an [G]zat hnga maw? [D]ka dawt khun nang c[G]aah..
fields.verse 3:
[G]Dawt aw ka tangnem cungah [D]in pom ta rih [G]ning, [Am]panh chialmal mit[D]hmai dawh te, zoh ka cim hrim[G]lo, kei ca'h zungzal theithiamtu van ngaknu dawh na [C]si, partha pardawh [G]vialte lak, [D]kei caah naa dawh [G]khun..

 [G]Lung hnangamnak a tling khun, [D]dawtmi tangnem [G]ah [Am]velhle tello na [D]dawtnak kei ca'h an thlum [G]khun, cung i a ceu fidi lei thing hnahchawl hna [C]nih, kan dawtnak an [G]zat hnga maw? [D]ka dawt khun nang c[G]aah..
fields.chorus: [G]Kan caah [C]dawtnak rimhmui pardawh an par [G]ee, kut zanem [D]tlai in roling dawtnak kan ser [G]lai, zan thlavang [C]tangah lengin duh bia kan phaiti [G]lai, ho ianglo [D]dawtnak nang le kei nih kan ngeih [G]cang...
fields.ending chorus: [G]Lungthli ka tum ka khen cang, [D]dawt nuhniang sin[G]ah,/ [G]nang biakamnak ka zum ee [D]vaaltha tahniang [G]aw..

fields.title: Kei Ka Luat Cang
fields.verse 1: [A]Biaceihnak [G]ah ka [D]dir Ka leiba [G]hal ding[D]ah, hmanhseh ka [G]ttih loh, [Bm]Ka luat lai ka [A]hngalh biakhiah caan [G]a phan [D]i, Luatnak thawng[G]tha ka [D]theih, hell chung [G]luatnak ticket [Bm]Pek ka si [A]cang, pek ka si [D]cang
fields.verse 2: [A]Hnu lei ka [G]kir lai [D]lo, Ka nunhlun [G]kal tak[D]in khrih ah mi[G]thar ka [Bm]si, Kei ka [A]luat cang, lam bi ah [G]kal hmanh [D]ning, Ruahchannak [G]in ka [D]khat inn ka phanh [G]tiang a ka-hruai lai [A]ka hngalh, inn ka phanh [D]tiang
fields.verse 3: ([A]Tlanh ka [D]si, Khrih thisen thawng[A]in)x2 kan luat [D]cang, miluat kan [A]si, kan luat [Bm]cang, miluat kan [A]si
fields.chorus: [Bm]Thangthat, thangthat [G]haleluiah [D]sual cikcin chah[A]piak ka si, [Bm]thangthat, thangthat [G]hallelujah, [D]Jesuh ka luat[A]nak na si, kei ka luat [D]cang..
fields.ending chorus: [A]Vawlei a [G]dongh tik[D]ah na inn cu [G]a zung[D]zal in a zung[G]zal tiang ka inn a si [A]lai

fields.title: Tlang Cung Ah A En mi Chin Ram
fields.verse 1: [D]Tlang cungah ho ianglo in a en mi [G]kan chinram [D]dawh cu, miphun dang nih rak run hna, cucaah [E]hlan kan pipu hna [A]nih, [D]an thisen le nunnak in an rak tlanh mi kan [G]chinram dawh cu [D[A]]ee, ram dawtu vialte hna nih ven ding le kilkawi ding cu kan [A]rian a [D]si..
fields.verse 2: [D]Ram dawtu mual liamcia chin mi raltha [G]vialte hna [D]nih, an nun pek tiang an ven mi kan ram [E]hi kan ven khawh ah[A]cun, [D]an rauthla tal in an i lawm lai, [G]teinak kan [D]hmuh tiang kamlo in dir hna usih, ram dawtu kan dawt kan nu [A]chinram ca[D]ah..
fields.verse 3: [D]Sak hnem ruun inn hmanh ah umlo in, [G]ram nan dawt tuk ruang[D]ah, sunghno chuan rawl ei zong nan duh lai, [E]fiang le tlangkip nan [A]cul, [D]Zaan ih merem kho lo le, ei chungpil [G]lo caan a tam [D]lai, nan retheihnak a par te lai, teirial uh nan ca'h thlacam [A]kan dailo [D]ee
fields.verse 4: [D]Sal si kan zuam hrim ti lo zalong tein [G]khuasak kan [D]duh, Bawipa pekmi kan ram hi, zohcimlo in [E]par bangin par chin seh[A]law, [D]kan biaknak nunphung hrawk le dolh a kan [G]timtu chung[D]in, kan luat khawhnak dingah cun, chinmi nih lungrual tein [A]kan doh a [D]herh
fields.chorus: [D]Kan biaknak kan nunphung, kan chinram le [A]vawlei [D]hna hi, kilven ding le humhak dingin chinmi nih [E]tuanvo kan [A]ngei, [D]CDF, CNA lung donglo le [A]kamlo [D]in, suttung bang in dir in hringtu kan dawt [G]chinram [D]caah, zanmui tian in khuaceu dawh [G]a dei lai caan [A]kan hngahhlang [D]ee,,

fields.title: Zumtu Pui Tling
fields.singer:
Bawi Hlei Cuai, Deborah Sung Mi, 
  Ni Chin Sung, Duh Tin Tuan
fields.verse 1: [A]Kan Pathian a dawtmi hna le amah nih a tinhmi ningin, a kawh [D]i a auh mi hna cu [A]zeithil an [Bm]ton mi poh an [E]ca'h, a [A]tha lei lawng te an si, cucu  kan pemh fianlo ahcun, kan ton [D]mi thil zeizong kip ah [A]lawmhbia chimlo [F#m]in vui le [A]vai lawng [E]kan rian sual ko [A]hnga...
fields.verse 2: [A]Thinghmui naamat kong kha ruat hmanh, thinghmui hma nih a tlunh ruangah, a fuh [D]i a panh ballo mi [A]Pathian mi [Bm]Elisa a [E]fuh, [A]amah fuh kan thiamnak hnga, a caan caan ah cun zawt le fah, tuar le [D]innak zong kha hmangin a [A]kan auh theu ve [F#m]tawn, vui le [A]vai ngam [E]ding kan si hna [A]lo..
fields.verse 3: [A]Peter cu Jeruslem arhli aw dawh tein a auh bang, mithiang [D]Paul cu mitcawtnak in [A]kan Pathian [Bm]nih cun a auh [E]ve, [A]awnem te le aw thlum te'n kawh le auh cu a thiam bangin a [D]caan caan ah cun harnak le [A]tuar le innak hmang[F#m]in, kan [A]Pathian nih a [E]kan auh theu [A]tawn..
fields.verse 4: [A]Jacob le a fa dawt rual hna,Josef sin an phak khawh nakhnga, an ram [D]ah mangtam a tlunter[A]tu zong kha [Bm]kan Pathian a [E]si, [A]sifah, harsatnak hna le rawltam tihalnak zong hi, amah [D]hmai kan kawlnak ding ca[A]ah kan ton theu ve [F#m]tawn, cuca'h vui[A]vai [E]sual hi a fawi [A]e..
fields.chorus: [A]Thlichia le tilet na ton lio ah, [D]na Pathian Jesuh [A]khrih cu, [Bm]na thangthat kho [E]maw? zumtu pui[A]tling kan ti mi hna cu, [D]lawmh le ngaihchiat caan [A]kipah, [E]bawipa an [A]thangthat..
fields.ending chorus: [A]Thlichia le tilet na ton lio ah, [D]na Pathian Jesuh [A]khrih cu, [Bm]na thangthat kho [E]maw? zumtu pui[A]tling kan ti mi hna cu, [D]lawmh le ngaihchiat caan [A]kipah, [E]bawipa an [A]thangthat..

fields.title: Pathian Zangfahnak
fields.singer: Deborah Sung Mi, Tha Chin Sung, Duh Tin Tuan
fields.verse 1: [D]Mino hna nan no lio caan [Bm]nuam tein hmang law, [Em]tlangval hna nan no lio Caan [A]nuamhnak in hmang uh, [D]sisehlaw nan tuah mi thil [Bm]poh ah khan, [Em]Pathian nih bia a ceih lai [A]ti philh hrim hlah [D]uh,
fields.verse 2: [D]Micheu nih nan i thawh lai [Bm]i kei cu, [Em]zeipoh tuah onh ka si ve [A]nan ti ko lai, [D]kei zong zeipoh tuah khawhnak [Bm]nawl ka ngei ko, [Em]siseh zeisal hmanh si hlah [A]uh, Paul nih a [D]ti..
fields.verse 3: [D]Zeizong vialte donghnak caan [Bm]cu a nai cang, [Em]cuca'h khat le khat i daw [A]hna usih, [D]dawtnak nih cun sualnak kha a [Bm]ngaihthiam tawn, [Em]dawtnak nih in khawhlo mi [A]zeihmanh a ngei[D]lo...
fields.verse 4: [D]Vawlei hi tlaihchan awk zei[Bm]hmanh a tlak lo, a [Em]nuamhnak le a par[A]dawhnak vialte zong, [D]zungzal ram ah kalpi khawh [Bm]ding an umlo, [Em]an ziam dih lai, lei pardawh[A]nak vialte hna [D]zong..
fields.chorus: [D]Ngaihmanh [G]Pathian, zangfah[A]nak hmuh caan cu [F#m]tu hi a [Bm]si, khamhnak hmuh [G]ni cu ni[A]hin hi a si [D]cang, [F#]caantha na ngeih lio [Bm]ah daithlang [Em]in kan um sual [A]maw? tha te'n ruat [D]tuah...
fields.ending chorus: [F#]caantha na ngeih lio [Bm]ah daithlang [Em]in kan um sual [A]maw? tha te'n ruat [D]tuah..

fields.title: Kawltung Lei Ah
fields.verse 1: [F]A thleng leng[C]mang mi khua caan hna [Dm]le, [Bb]kirthan um ti lo in a [F]luangmi tiva bang[C]in, kan nunnak [Dm]nih [Bb]hnu kirthan ti umlo [F]in, zei kan ton lai [C]ti zong hngallo mi [Dm]mitcaw bangin, nun karhlang mi [C]ka nunnak hi [Bb]na thlarau thianghlim in [C]Bawipa nang nih run ka hruai [F]hram mu,
fields.verse 2: [F]Tlik zuamnak [C]chungah telmi hna [Dm]cu, [Bb]timhtuahnak fel tein an [F]ngei tawn, sihmanhseh[C]law cu teinak [Dm]cu, [Bb]uai kho mi lukhimh ca a [F]si, Bawipa i timhpiak [C]mi laksawng cu, [Dm]zeitik hmanhah uai kho ti lo [C]mi nunnak a si ca'h, [Bb]Jesuh khrih zohchih in kawltung lei ah tli mi ka [F]si ee..
fields.verse 3: [F]Sualmuihnak [C]chungah lengmi ka si [Dm]ca'h, [Bb]sualnak nih ka nunnak a [F]uk i, thil thalo [C]tuah in ka um [Dm]tawn, [Bb]Bawipa dawtnak hngal lo[F]in, hmanhseh tu ah cun [C]ka nunnak nih [Dm]bawipa tinhpiak mi laksawng [C]co ve dingin [Bb]ka pumsa kha hrem in, mah le mah uk khawh nun ka [F]ngei cang..
fields.chorus: Hnulei thil [C]philh in, hmailei thil [Dm]banh zuam in,kawltung lei [Bb]ah laksawng hmuh awkah [F]ka tli, cucaah [C]bawipa, na kutcak [Dm]thawnnak in ka hruailaw [Bb]zaangder mi ka si ca[F]ah, nangmah ah [C]cun teinak/thawnnak a [Dm]um, himnak le [Bb]kan i dornak lungpi na [F]si, na kan kamh [C]mi sui luchin dawh [Dm]co ve dingin bawipa [Bb]nang nih thawnnak rak ka pe [F]hram law..
fields.ending chorus: nangmah ah [C]cun thawnnak a [Dm]um, himnak le [Bb]kan i dornak lungpi na [F]si, na kan kamh [C]mi sui luchin dawh [Dm]co ve dingin bawipa [Bb]nang nih thawnnak rak ka pe [F]hram law..

fields.title: Cu Hmun Cu
fields.verse 1: [A]Zaanlei ninu, a phen khawhlo mi ramnuam, zaan khuamui zong um ti lo nak ram[E]nuam, lung[A]retheih harsat [D]um ti lo nak [A]khuapi, aw cu hmu cu kei [E]ca'h van a rak si..
fields.verse 2: [A]Pakhat le pakhat dohral um ti lo nak hmun, harsat buainak chungin zalennak [E]ram, khat le [A]khat thinlung [D]hliam um ti lo [A]nak cu, aw cu hmun cu kei [E]ca'h van a rak [A]si..
fields.verse 3: [A]Khamhtu Jesuh a hmai kan hmuh te tik cun, kan tahnak mitthli vialte an hul [E]lai, Siang[A]pahrang bawi bik [D]cu ka thangthat [A]ve lai, aw cu hmun cu kei [E]ca'h van a rak [A]si..
fields.chorus: [A]Zei bantuk dah si [D]hnga cu ram kan [A]phak cun, tiva ral hmunnuam ah kan dawtmi hna [E]he, kan i [A]tong lai khamh[D]tu sunparnak [A]pe in, aw cu hmun cu kei [E]ca'h van a rak [A]si..
fields.ending chorus: [A]kan i tong lai khamh[D]tu sunparnak [A]pe in, aw cu hmun cu kei [E]ca'h van a rak [A]si..

fields.title: Na Min Thang Chin Ko Seh
fields.verse 1: [Am]Ka sual ruang ah ningzah na [F]in, vailamtah cung[C]ah, thihnak tiang [G]tuarin, [Am]ka nunnak ca nunnak na [F]pek, a vel ka ca a [C]luang, na thisen thawng[G]in
fields.verse 2: [Am]Ngaihthiam tlaklo na ka ngaih[F]thiam hmurka chim khawh [C]lo, khuaruahhar dawt[G]nak, [Am]na thawnnak in thawhter ka [F]si, na nunnak kaa hrawm [C]cang na lianngannak [G]in
fields.chorus: [C]Teitu ka si [G]cang, thawnnak na ka [Am]pek, a lianngan bik Bawi[F]pa na min thang chin ko [C]seh, nunnak ka ngei [G]cang, lawmhnak na ka [Am]pek, a zungzal hmun mi [F]Bawi na min thang chin ko [Am]seh
fields.ending chorus:
[F]Hosanna, [C]Hosanna [G]thangthatnak kan pek OH..[F]hosanna, [C]Hosanna [G]Sunparnak kan pek hosanna OH.., [F]Hosanna, [C]Hosanna, [G]ka lungthin dihlak in hla ka [F]sa 

 Teitu ka si cang, thawnnak na ka pek, a lianngan bik Bawipa na min thang chin ko seh, nunnak ka ngei cang, lawmhnak na ka pek, a zungzal hmun mi Bawi na min thang chin ko seh

fields.title: Thlarau Le Biatak
fields.verse 1: ([F]Maw Bawi Jesuh nang[C]mah hlei in aho[Dm]hmanh velngei kho [Bb]tu an [F]um ti lai [C]lo, Biak [F]awk tlak le thang[C]that awk tlak Bawi[Dm]pa zungzal na [Bb]min thang[F]that si ko [C]seh)2
fields.verse 2: [F]Thleidannak ngeilo [C]hawikom tha [Dm]Jesuh ningzah mual[Bb]phonak [F]vialte hlawnh[C]piaktu, ka [F]nunnak hi nang [C]mah pehmi nunnak hi [Dm]nunnak thiang [Bb]in Nang[F]mah kan thang[C]that
fields.verse 3: [Bb]Sifah caan, ngaihchiat [F]caan zong ah [Bb]zawtfah caan, lungkuai [F]caan zongah [Dm]Bawipa cu a tha, a tha [C]zungzal, [Bb]Rili tilet thlicia [F]hrang hmanhseh [Bb]harnak phunkip zong tong [F]ko hmanh ning him[Dm]nak lungpi chung in Bawipa kan thang[C]that zungzal
fields.chorus: [C]Kutthlir bu in [F]Bawi[C]pa nang [Dm]kan biak thlarau le bia[Bb]tak in [F]kan biak zungzal [C]lai, vancung bantuk [F]in [C]hi lei cung[Dm]ah na duhnak cu [Bb]tling cang [F]ko seh Bawi[C]pa, a zungzal tling cang [F]seh
fields.ending chorus: [C]Kutthlir bu in [F]Bawi[C]pa nang [Dm]kan biak thlarau le bia[Bb]tak in [F]kan biak zungzal [C]lai, vancung bantuk [F]in [C]hi lei cung[Dm]ah na duhnak cu [Bb]tling cang [F]ko seh Bawi[C]pa, a zungzal tling cang [F]seh

fields.title: Zei Thil Poh Tlung Hmanh Seh
fields.verse 1: [E]Zei thil poh tlung hmanh[B]seh, [A]ka hna a ngam ka [B]pawngah Jesuh a [E]um, ka [B]hngalh, a [E]kutnem tein a ka [B]pom,a [A]ka zohkheh [B]timi fiang tein ka [E]hngalh,
fields.verse 2: [E]Thlichia tilet lak zong[B]ah [A]him tein ka [B]nun na ven ka [E]hngalh Bawi[B]pa, [E]thinphannak lungretheih[B]nak ka [A]ton zongah [B]na ka huhphenh timi ka [E]hngalh..
fields.verse 3: [E]Harnak le lungretheih[B]nak, ka [A]ton zongah na [B]ka theihpi ka [E]hngalh Bawi[B]pa, ka [E]ton mi thil vialte hna [B]hi, na [A]ka theihpi [B]na ka hngalhpi dih mi an [E]si..
fields.chorus: [A]ka nunnak hi [B]na kutchung ah a [E]um, [A]him tein na [B]ka zohkhenh na ka [E]ven ka [B]hngalh, [E]ka tihlo ka [B]phang tilo a [A]zungzal in [B]Jesuh khrih ka pawngah a [E]um..
fields.ending chorus: [A]ka nunnak hi [B]na kutchung ah a [E]um, [A]him tein na [B]ka zohkhenh na ka [E]ven ka [B]hngalh, [E]ka tihlo ka [B]phang tilo a [A]zungzal in [B]Jesuh khrih ka pawngah a [E]um..

fields.title: Jesuh He
fields.singer: Biak Hlei Par, Iang Len Sung, Betty Mang Hlei Par
fields.verse 1:
[F]Maw hawidawt, zumhnak in Bawipa ram kan karhlan [Gm]lio ahhin, [Bb]harnak le hneksaknak tampi kan ton a [F]herh,
 [F]minung fimnak, thiamnak, hngalhnak le thawnnak nih [Gm]hin, [Bb]Bawipa timhpiak mi ram cu phak khawh a si[F]lo, 
 [Dm]amah bochan buin [C]kalmi hna le [F]zumhnak lung a ngeimi [Bb]hna lawng nih hin, [Eb]harnak le fahnak an [Bb]ton tikah an i let[C]lo, Bawipa sinah thazang thar an [F]la..
fields.verse 2:
[F]Khrih rianthiang, tuan dingah a zumh lei lawng hi silo [Gm]in, [Bb]a ca'h teminnak hmuh ding zong hi aa tel[F]chih, 
 [f]kan thazang, kan thawnnak kan hriamnam kan teinak [Gm]hna hi, [Bb]Bawipa pekmi thiangthlarau thawng lawng in aa si [F]lai, 
 [Dm]amah bochan buin [C]kalmi hna le [F]zumhnak lung a ngeimi [Bb]hna lawng nih hin, [Eb]harnak le fahnak an [Bb]ton tikah an i let[C]lo, Bawipa sinah thazang thar an [F]la..
fields.verse 3:
[F]Khi lamthiang ramnuam le ram dawh bik mi chungah [Gm]cun, [Bb]Bawipa thimmi fa le hna lawng, an lut [F]lai, 
 [F]pumsa duhnak le sualnak tuahmi an lut kho [Gm]lai lo, [Bb]tuufa cauk chung min tialmi lawng an [F]lut lai,
[Dm]amah bochan buin [C]kalmi hna le [F]zumhnak lung a ngeimi [Bb]hna lawng nih hin, [Eb]harnak le fahnak an [Bb]ton tikah an i let[C]lo, Bawipa sinah thazang thar an [F]la..
fields.chorus: [F]Ka Bawipa timhpiak mi van sui [Eb]dawh, phak lai hngahlang mi van inn nuam [Bb]cu, khamhcia mi hna lennak hmunnuam [F]khi... ..[C], [F]cu hmunah ngaihchiat um ti lai [Eb]lo, fahnak le tahnak zong um ti lai [Bb]lo, lunglawm in khamhtu Bawi kan thangthat hna [F]lai.... .[C], [Bb]Jesuh he [C]zungzal in zungzal tiang kan leng [F]lai...
fields.ending chorus: [G]Ka Bawipa timhpiak mi van sui [F]dawh, phak lai hngahlang mi van inn nuam [C]cu, khamhcia mi hna lennak hmunnuam [G]khi..  ..[D], [G]cu hmunah ngaihchiat um ti lai [F]lo, fahnak le tahnak zong um ti lai [C]lo, lunglawm in khamhtu Bawi kan thangthat hna [G]lai..  .. [D], [C]Jesuh he zung[D]zal in zungzal tiang kan leng [G]lai...[C]Jesuh he zung[D]zal in zungzal tiang kan leng [G]lai...

fields.title: Pathian aw lawng
fields.singer: Rev.H. Thomas Tial Uk & Biak Hlei Par
fields.verse 1: [A]Hello hello na dam [C#m]maw? ti[F#m]in ka duhdawtmi [C#m]hna [D]telephone [A]chawnh le biak [Bm]daithlang lo in ka caantha ka pek [E]tawn hna, [A]Hallelujah ka Bawi[C#m]pa ti[F#m]in ka Pathian bel [C#m]cu [D]chawnh le biak [A]ka daithlang [Bm]cucaah awnem le duhnung [E]cu kaa thei kho [A]lo
fields.verse 2: [A]Hello hello na dam [C#m]maw ti[F#m]in lei ka hawikom [C#m]hna [D]messager [A]cakuat le [Bm]an cakuat rel ah caan ka hman [E]a tampi, [A]sisehlaw ka Bawi Je[C#m]suh a [F#m]ka dawtnak bible [C#m]thiang [D]zoh le rel [A]ka daithlang, [Bm]cuca'h thlarau lei in ka tha[E]zang a der hring[A]hran..
fields.verse 3: [A]Hello hello na dam [C#m]maw? ti[F#m]in lei mirum mi [C#m]hna, [D]telephone  [A]chawnh le biak [Bm]daithlanglo in pehtlaihnak ka [E]tuah peng hna, [A]Sihmanhsehlaw ka Bawi[C#m]pa, [F#m]thluachuah vialte a ngei[C#m]tu, [D]pehtlaih caan ka ngeilo, [Bm]cuca'h taksa thlarau in thlua[E]chuah ka hmu kho [A]lo..
fields.verse 4: [A]Hello hello na dam [C#m]maw? ti[F#m]in lei ah uktu [C#m]bawi, [D]telephone [A]chawnh le biak [Bm]le an tangah dor in caantha [E]ka hman tawn, [A]sihmanhsehlaw ka [C#m]Pathian [F#m]sin thlaza cam ka dai[C#m]thlang, [D]cucaah [A]toidor nun [Bm]hmangin chungkhar ah vanram nun [E]dawh ka ser kho [A]lo..
fields.chorus: [A]Pathian aw lawng [E]kan ca'h lunglawmh[F#m]nak pe[C#m]tu an si, [Bm]ngaihchiat caan ah lunglawmhnak a [E]kan petu,minung [A]hawi aw [E]theih cu thinlung [F#m]hliam khuai[C#m]tu an tam, [D]Pathian aw lawng taksa le t[E]hlarau in kan dam[A]nak..
fields.ending chorus: [A]Pathian aw lawng [E]kan ca'h lunglawmh[F#m]nak pe[C#m]tu an si, [Bm]ngaihchiat caan ah lunglawmhnak a [E]kan petu,minung [A]hawi aw [E]theih cu thinlung [F#m]hliam khuai[C#m]tu an tam, [D]Pathian aw lawng taksa le t[E]hlarau in kan dam[A]nak..

fields.title: Nifatin In Nang Kan Herh
fields.verse 1:
[F]Nifatin in Nang kan herh, nifatin in Nang kan [Dm]duh, nizan nakin [C]nihin ah kan herh deuh [F]Bawipa 
 [F]Harnak lak ah ka nun hi nang lo cun ka tha a [Dm]ba tukforh ka tei [C]khawh nakhnga run ka bawm zung[F]zal
fields.verse 2: [F]Nifatin in Nang kan herh, nifatin in Nang kan [Dm]duh, sui ngun chawva [C]hna nakin kan duh deuh [F]Bawipa, Na [F]mithmai ceu chung lawng ah hnangam lunglawmhnak a [Dm]tling na umnak hmun [C]vialte hi kei ca vanram an [F]si
fields.chorus: [F]Bawipa, Nang lawng kan bo[Dm]chan Bawipa, [C]Nang lawng kan tlaih[F]chan Bawipa, Nang lawng ka Pa[Dm]thian Bawipa, [C]Nang lawng ka nun[F]nak Bawipa, Nang lawng pakhat[Dm]nak hi vaw[C]lei vialte lak [F]ah
fields.ending chorus: [F]Bawipa, Nang lawng kan bo[Dm]chan Bawipa, [C]Nang lawng kan tlaih[F]chan Bawipa, Nang lawng ka Pa[Dm]thian Bawipa, [C]Nang lawng ka nun[F]nak Bawipa, Nang lawng pakhat[Dm]nak hi vaw[C]lei vialte lak [F]ah

fields.title: Zungzal In Bawipa Thangthat
fields.composer: Biak Tin Thang, Bawi Za Hu
fields.verse 1: [Bb]Zungzal in [F]Bawipa kan thangthat ko [C]lai tingtang le [Dm]hladawh in kan thangthat [Bb]lai Zungzal in [F]Bawipa kan thangthat ko [C]lai Harnak le [Dm]ngaihchiatnak ton caan zong[Bb]ah Kutthlir [F]bu[C]in [Bb]kan thangthat lai Lunglawm [F]te[C]in [Bb]kan thangthat lai
fields.verse 2: [Bb]Zungzal in [F]Bawipa kan thangthat ko [C]lai tingtang le [Dm]hladawh in kan thangthat [Bb]lai Zungzal in [F]Bawipa kan thangthat ko [C]lai Harnak le [Dm]ngaihchiatnak ton caan zong[Bb]ah Kutthlir [F]bui[C]n [Bb]kan thangthat lai Lunglawm [F]tei[C]n [Bb]kan thangthat lai
fields.verse 3: ([Bb]Kutthlir [F]bui[C]n [Bb]ka thangthat lai lunglawm [F]tei[C]n k[Bb]an thangthat lai )3
fields.chorus: [F]Ka nunnak, ka thlarau [C]ka zeizong tein [Dm]Bawipa nang cu zungzal [Bb]kan thangthat lai, a thiang [F]bik [C]mi [Bb]Pa Pathian, [F]ka ningzahnak ralchiatnak [C]kaltak dih in [Dm]Bawipa nang cu zungzal [Bb]kan thangthat lai a thiang [F]bik [C]mi [Bb]Pa Pathian
fields.ending chorus: [F]Ka nunnak, ka thlarau [C]ka zeizong tein [Dm]Bawipa nang cu zungzal [Bb]kan thangthat lai, a thiang [F]bik [C]mi [Bb]Pa Pathian, [F]ka ningzahnak ralchiatnak [C]kaltak dih in [Dm]Bawipa nang cu zungzal [Bb]kan thangthat lai a thiang [F]bik [C]mi [Bb]Pa Pathian  (Haleluiah )6

fields.title: Tuanvo Latu
fields.verse 1: [B]Ka ih zaanmang khi [F#]a hluan ee [B]Bawipa, hnawmpawn le lei[E]dip in na ka [B]chuah ii, hi hmun le sining ah na ka [F#]cawisan, ka [B]phulo ee, ka [E]phu hrimhrim lo ee [B]na dawtnak [F#]ka ca'h a luangliam [F#]ee
fields.verse 2: [B]Ka ningzahnak puan[F#]lu na ka hun[B]piak, kan ngaihchiatnak [E]mitthli na ka hnawh[B]piak, ka thilrit vialte cu na ka chan [F#]dih, [B]mitthli caan ah lawmh[E]nak chiti thiang le [B]vutcam ai-ah [F#]pangpar na ka [B]oih..
fields.verse 3: [B]Mifim le mithiam [F#]an tam na[B]in, misual santlai[E]lo a ka thimtu [B]aw, langak na hman bang a ka hmang duh[F#]tu, na [B]dawtnak in na thlua[E]chuah puan in [B]lum tein [F#]a ka vorhtu Bawi[B]pa..
fields.verse 4: [B]Ka keh le ka orh ka [F#]hnu ka hmai [B]in na ka pek mi [E]thil ka zohthan tik[B]ah na mui ka hmuh ee, maw ka bawi nun[F#]nem, [B]haleluiah ti[E]in nitin zantin [[F#]]au in lawmh bia[F#]chimlo kho si [B]lo..
fields.chorus: sifak le [F#]santlailo, nuhmei le [G#m]ngaktah hna tuanvo a [e]kan latu ka bawi [B]jesuh, [F#]a caan ah cun ka lung a lawmh tuk [B]ahhin, biangno cungin mitthli zur kiar[E]mar tawn, [G#m]lawmhbia chim[F#]zia hmanh kei ka thiam[B]lo...
fields.ending chorus: sifak le [F#]santlailo, nuhmei le [G#m]ngaktah hna tuanvo a [e]kan latu ka bawi [B]jesuh, [F#]a caan ah cun ka lung a lawmh tuk [B]ahhin, biangno cungin mitthli zur kiar[E]mar tawn, [G#m]lawmhbia chim[F#]zia hmanh kei ka thiam[B]lo...

fields.title: A Tlai Ballo Jesuh
fields.singer: Rev.H.Thomas Tial Uk, Hlawn Bor Cin
fields.verse 1: [G]Lazaruh cu [D]a damlo tiin, Jesuh khrih cu an cah i, si[C]hmanhsehlaw a [G]ralo, Lazaruh cu a thi [D]cang an ti, sihmanhsehlaw Jesuh nih a [C]thih tunglo aa [D]hngilh a si a [G]ti,
fields.verse 2: [D]Nili le zaanli a [D]si cang, a thu dih cang lai an ti, ma[C]ry le martha [G]nih cun, minung lei khel lung dongh [D]hnu pin in, a thawnnak hmul a lang i [C]Lazaruh zong [D]nih hngilhnak a hmuh [G]ee
fields.verse 3: [G]A caan ah cun a tlai [D]theu tawn i, cuca'h lung dong ngaihchia in [C]vuivai caan a [G]tampi, kan duhning bang silo [D]in amah duhning hngah zia thiam zong hi a [C]sunparnak langh[D]nak an rak si [G]tawn..
fields.verse 4: [G]Taksa thlarau ka dam[D]lo caah, mitthli tla le thinlung kuai in [C]kan auh theu [G]i kan kawl, sihmanhsehlaw kan auh [D]lio theng ah a ralo nan a caan hmaan te[C]in Jesuh [D]cu rian a tuan zung[G]zal..
fields.chorus: [G]Jesuh nih Lazaruh, rak tho cang tin [C]a ti, a ti bang [G]Lazaruh cu thlan chungin a tho ee [D]amen a tlai ballo [G]Jesuh, a caan hmaan te'n [C]a ra, a fa dawt le [G]kan tahnak [Em]mitthli [D]hrawmhpitu Bawi [D]Jesuh..
fields.ending chorus: [G]Jesuh nih Lazaruh, rak tho cang tin [C]a ti, a ti bang [G]Lazaruh cu thlan chungin a tho ee [D]amen a tlai ballo [G]Jesuh, a caan hmaan te'n [C]a ra, a fa dawt le [G]kan tahnak [Em]mitthli [D]hrawmhpitu Bawi [D]Jesuh..

fields.title: Mi Vantha Bik
fields.verse 1: Vawlei mi kan i dawtnak hi cu, a hmunlo mi dawtnak a si, chikhat ca'h menmen lawng an si, mitha cu kan dawt nain, mithalo cu kan daw kho hna lo, sihmanhsehlaw kan Bawipa Jesuh cu misual mi dawtu a si..
fields.verse 2: Vawilei mi kan i dawtnak hi cu, a hmunlo mi dawtnak a si, nu le va zong kan i daw ko, sihmanhseh cu dawtnak cu caan a rauh tikah huatnak a chuak, sihmanhsehlaw  kan Bawipa Jesuh i dawtnak cu a hmun zungzal, Vawilei mi kan i dawtnak hi cu, a hmunlo mi dawtnak a si, nu le pa nih fanu fapa an dawtnak zong a hmunlo, fanu fapa that caan lawnglawng ah an dawt tawn hna, sihmanhsehlaw Jesuh nih cu a kan dawt peng ee
fields.verse 3: Vawlei mi kan i dawtnak hi cu a hmunlo mi dawtnak a si, sihmanhsehlaw Bawipa Jesuh misual mi a kan dawtnak cu a hmun zungzal, misual ka si lio zongah hlaw lo in dawtu Bawipa, mi vantha bik mi kan si..
fields.chorus: Dawtnak vialte lakah a sung bik le a sang bik dawtnak in dawtu Bawipa, Hawidawt nang na ruat bal maw? miding le mifel ca'h silo, misual bik nang le kei caah Kavary tlangah luhloh tiangin, dawtnak hi a sung bik le a sang bik dawtnak a si..
fields.ending chorus: Dawtnak vialte lakah a sung bik le a sang bik dawtnak in dawtu Bawipa, Hawidawt nang na ruat bal maw? miding le mifel ca'h silo, misual bik nang le kei caah Kavary tlangah luhloh tiangin, dawtnak hi a sung bik le a sang bik dawtnak a si.

fields.title: Tuanvo latu Bawi
fields.singer: Rev.H.Thomas Tial Uk , Duh Len Sung,Bawi Tha Chin
fields.verse 1: [B]Zei ko hen ka si, hi tluk[E]in ka zawn [F#]na [B]ruah [G#m]i, na hnak[B]kar teah na ka [E]tenh ka [F#]bawi [B]nunnem, na ngaih kan chiatter i na [E]lung kan fahter [B]zung[G#m]zal, keimah [B]ruangah mitthli zei[F#]zat ko hen [B]luang cang
fields.verse 2: [B]Zei ko hen ka si, hi tluk[E]in ka zawn [F#]na [B]ruah [G#m]i, na hnak[B]kar teah na ka [E]tenh ka [F#]bawi [B]nunnem,  ka thinlung karuahnak nih [E]an lawmhter kho [B]bal[G#m]lo, chungthu [B]in lengnal nun a [F#]nunglo mi ka [B]si..
fields.verse 3: [B]Zei ko hen ka si, hi tluk[E]in ka zawn [F#]na [B]ruah [G#m]i, na hnak[B]kar teah na ka [E]tenh ka [F#]bawi [B]nunnem,  pathian ti awk hi ka [E]tlak hrimhrim lo [B]kei [G#m]cu, na thang[B]chiattertu le na ning[F#]zahtertu ka si..
fields.verse 4: [B]Zei ko hen ka si, hi tluk[E]in ka zawn [F#]na [B]ruah [G#m]i, na hnak[B]kar teah na ka [E]tenh ka [F#]bawi [B]nunnem,  ngaithiam [E]cawk ding le pomhlawm cawk ding zong ka [B]si[G#m]lo, lung[B]sau le thingfual tein [F#]kilkuaitu ka [B]Pa..
fields.chorus: [B]Sual cu hua [E]in, misual a [B]dawtu, mithurhnawm [F#]bik mi keimah hmanh [B]hnuchit sianglo in, a ka daw [E]i, tuanvo la[B]tu bawi, zingzan mual[F#]pholo, ka nunnak [G#m]caah, ka herh [E]mi tuaktanpiaktu [F#]aw ka Bawi [B]nunnem..
fields.ending chorus: [B]Sual cu hua [E]in, misual a [B]dawtu, mithurhnawm [F#]bik mi keimah hmanh [B]hnuchit sianglo in, a ka daw [E]i, tuanvo la[B]tu bawi, zingzan mual[F#]pholo, ka nunnak [G#m]caah, ka herh [E]mi tuaktanpiaktu [F#]aw ka Bawi [B]nunnem..

fields.title: Bawipa Na Pawng Ah
fields.verse 1: [Eb]Bawipa na pawngah um ka duh ee, Bawipa na pawng[Bb]ah thut ka duh [Eb]ee, nangmah pawng ka um ahcun ka thil[F]rit a zang dih [Bb]ee, vawlei uktu [Eb]le pengtu hna pawng, thut le to cu [Bb]Bawipa a har [Eb]tuk ka thil a rit ee, nangmah pawng [Cm]um lawngah hnangam[Bb]nak tling ka hmuh [Eb]ee.
fields.verse 2: [Bb]Inntha tang i [Eb]thut zong hi a nuam, Bawi thutden i [Bb]thut zong a nuam [Eb]ko, siseh cu nakin Bawipa na pawng [F]thut hi a nuam [Bb]deuh, kan harsatnak [Eb]le ka intuarnak [Bb]kan in ruah i kan in chimh ah[Eb]hin, Bawipa aw lawmhnak na kan pek[Cm]than, cuca'h na pawng [Bb]um hi kan cim[Eb]lo..
fields.verse 3: [Bb]Vawlei mi pawng [Eb]i ka thut ahcun vawlei bia le [Bb]hla tampi kan [Eb]thei, Bawipa na pawng i kan um ahcun [F]na awnem kan [Bb]thei, mifim, mithiam [Eb]pawng kan thut ahcun vawlei fimnak [Bb]bia tampi kan [Eb]thei Bawipa na pawng i kan thut ah[Cm]cun thiang thlarau [Bb]fimnak tampi kan [Eb]co..
fields.chorus: [Eb]Kan zawtfah caan[Ab]ah damnak sibawi, na kan si[Eb]piak i, mihrut le minga ka ca'h cawnpiak[F]tu saya na [Bb]si, mitthli he kan [Eb]tah lio caan zongah, a kan hnemh i [Ab]mitthli hnawhpiaktu, ka thil a rih caan ah thilrit [Cm]chawngtu na si Bawi[Bb]pa kan dawt tuk [Eb]ee..
fields.ending chorus: [Eb]Kan zawtfah caan[Ab]ah damnak sibawi, na kan si[Eb]piak i, mihrut le minga ka ca'h cawnpiak[F]tu saya na [Bb]si, mitthli he kan [Eb]tah lio caan zongah, a kan hnemh i [Ab]mitthli hnawhpiaktu, ka thil a rih caan ah thilrit [Cm]chawngtu na si Bawi[Bb]pa kan dawt tuk [Eb]ee..

fields.title: Lei Tangtu Ngei Lo
fields.verse 1: [G]Lei tangtu ngeilo in [C]vansang a au [G]mi, misual hnulei a tang[D]tu Bawi, [Em]Jesuh khrih cu [D]misual hawikom [G]tha, [C]kei misual bik [D]zong hlaw sianglo [G]in, ka ning[C]zahnak puan[D]lu cu huhpiak [G]in, aw ka [C]fa kan dawt [D]tuk e a ka [G]ti...
fields.verse 2: [G]AW thlichiat ruatlo in [C]pasaltha hna [G]nih, lung diriam in an in tuk [D]kha [Em]aw Jesuh [D]keimah ruangah a [G]si, [C]tuar le in na [D]ka siang hrim[G]lo mu, na thlet [C]mi thi le [D]hnai cu kei [G]misual ka sual [C]thiannak ca'h [D]na ka thletpiak [G]mu..
fields.verse 3: [G]Lei ah chuahchan ngeilo [C]ca'h ka ruahchan[G]nak, nun beidong in ka um [D]caan ah, [Em]lung thawnnak le [D]thazang petu [G]Bawi, [C]nun rocar mi [D]hninhnoter than[G]tu, cu[C]caah beidong [D]in ka um lai [G]lo aw Je[C]suh nang cu [D]ka zeizong na s[G]i,
fields.verse 4: [G]Aww ri ngeilo dawtnak [C]in a ka daw[G]tu, zeizong kip ah tuanvo la[D]tu, [Em]keh le orh, hnu, [D]hmai ka zoh [G]ah [C]ngeihchiah thil [D]zei ka hmulo na[G]in, Jesuh [C]nang kan hmuh [D]caah hna a [G]ngam, aw [C]nang cu ka zei[D]zong hrampi na [G]si..
fields.chorus: [D]Aw.. ka phulo [G]ee, [C]aw ka Bawi nun[G]nem, [C]van khuapi cu [D]chuahtak ruangmang [G]in, ka [C]ai ah sar[D]thih thihpiak ding[G]in,lei ah [C]na rak tum [D]himnak ka [D]pe, aw ka [C]phu lo ee, ka [D]phu hrim hrim [G]lo,,
fields.ending chorus: Aw.. ka phulo ee, aw ka Bawi nunnem, van khuapi cu chuahtak ruangmang in, ka ai ah sarthih thihpiak dingin,lei ah na rak tum himnak ka pe, aw ka phu lo ee, ka phu hrim hrim lo...

fields.title: Bawipa Lawmhter Ko Usih
fields.verse 1: [G]Van le vaw[C]lei le [F]zeizong [C[Em]]tinkip hi a sertu kan pathian i a [G]kutchung ah an [C]um,thli [F]le van ruahhang [C]hna zong amah kut chungah a [G]um, amah a lawmhter[Am]tu miphun hna i sin [Em]ah thlifim le van ruah hang a sur i a [F]hrantertu bawi a [C]si Bawi[Am]pa [G]lawmhter ko u[C]sih
fields.verse 2: [G]Bawipa ai [C]lawmh cun [F]kan ral tih[C]nung zong a kan dohpiak i teinak cu [G]kan hmuh hrimhrim [C]lai, kan [F]ei le kan din [C]mi le kan tuah i kan tuan [G]mi nih, Bawipa a lawmh[Am]ter maw, Bawipa ngaihchiat[Em]ter dah , zoh in ruatthan usih maw zumtu [F]unau, thlazacam [C]buin Bawi[Am]pa [G]lawmhter ko u[C]sih
fields.verse 3: [G]Chungkhar ah [C]vannun a [F]hmangtu hna [C]khi Sui le ngun le chaw le va ngei [G]mi an si [C]hlei lo,Bawi[F]pa lawmhtertu [C]an si dawtnak in rum mi [G]an si, siknak le maw [Am]velhnak tahnak le maw [Em]mitthli nih an innchungkhar ah hmun a ting [F]ve lo dawtnak in [C]an rum, Bawi[Am]pa [G]lawmhter ko u[C]sih.
fields.verse 4: [G]Mithum kho [C]tu le a [F]cawi sang [C]kho tu zong hi a nung kan pathian [G]jesuh khi a [C]si,ram[F]car a parter[C]tu le a hlorh kho tu zong [G]a si, nebukkhanezar [Am]thumtu zong Bawipa a [Em]si David siangpahrang ah a hlorhtu [F]zong kha kan pathian a [C]si Bawi[Am]pa [G]lawmhter ko u[Em]sih .
fields.chorus: Inn[F]chungkhar damtertu [C]le khrihfa bu damter[G]tu zong a nung pathian a [Am]si chunglei le leng[Em]lei ral a kan teipiaktu zong kan pathian a [F]si cu a si [C]caah Bawi[Am]pa [G]lawmhter ko u[C]sih..
fields.ending chorus: Inn[F]chungkhar damtertu [C]le khrihfa bu damter[G]tu zong a nung pathian a [Am]si chunglei le leng[Em]lei ral a kan teipiaktu zong kan pathian a [F]si cu a si [C]caah Bawi[Am]pa [G]lawmhter ko u[C]sih,Bawi[Am]pa [G]lawmhter ko u[C]sih..

fields.title: Nunthar He Lamthar
fields.verse 1: [E]Hi vawlei nih an [A]theithiam[E]lo, chunglei i khrih nun hnangam[B]nak, [E]hawikom thing nih an [A]theithiam[E]lo uktu thar he nun[B]thar tuanbia,
fields.verse 2: [E]Kei cu lamthar hmuh[A]saktu [E]le nunthar cawnpiaktu ka [B]ngei cang, [E]ka thlarau ah thiang [A]thlarau [E]in Pathian fa ka si a[B] ka hngalhter..
fields.verse 3: [E]Hlan ka tuanbia cu [A]philhpiak [E]in ka sualpalhnak vial[B]te hna zong, [E]a thihnak le phum[A]nak i hrawm [E]in, a thothan mi nun[B]thar ka co cang...
fields.chorus: [E]Nunhlun hawi[A]kom thing [E]le lamhlun zulh a [B]rem ti lo, [E]nunthar hawi[A]kom thar [E]he, lamthar kei ka [B]zulh cang lai, [F#m]har hmanhsehlaw lam hruaitu ka [B]ngei, [A]ka nun uktu [B]hawikom tha Je[E]suh...
fields.ending chorus: [E]Nunhlun hawi[A]kom thing [E]le lamhlun zulh a [B]rem ti lo, [E]nunthar hawi[A]kom thar [E]he, lamthar kei ka [B]zulh cang lai, [F#m]har hmanhsehlaw lam hruaitu ka [B]ngei, [A]ka nun uktu [B]hawikom tha Je[E]suh...

fields.title: Ka Fiang Kho Lo
fields.verse 2: [A]Aw ka [D]dawt aa co [A]kho ding kan si [Bm]lo ee, hnulei [G]kir ko usih, kan dawt[D]nak a ziam lai [Bm]lo ti [Em]mi bia nih khan na far thinlung a [A]fahter tuk ee, lengdang [G]tang pom duh ah maw, na far [D]kei ka lung fah[Bm]nak zai[Em]hla in hlawi hna kan [A]dawt tuk ee ka [D]ta aw
fields.verse 1: [A]Nuam le [D]lawm mithmai [A]panh te'n kan i [Bm]chawnh caan, harnak [G]ton caan le lungre[D]theih lio caan [Bm]ah, ka [Em]thin hnemtu, lawmhtertu na si [A]tawn, na dawt[G]nak a thlum, na aa[D]ka nih lung an [Bm]hlau, um[Em]nak dang hmanhseh na [A]dawtnak kaa tang [D]cungah..
fields.chorus: Ka tuar kho [G]lo ka dawt nang he [D]then a fah hi, ka fiang kho [G]lo ka dawt, kan tian[D]nak hi ka fiang kho [Bm]lo, lung[Em]thli ruahlo in tianzai na rel [A]hi ka fiang hrimlo khenkham[G]tu ruangah maw nangmah [D]duhthimnak hen a [Bm]si na [Em]far kaa lungsaknak ca na [A]lungchung biathuk hna hi ka chim ta [D]ko mu..
fields.ending chorus: [Em]na lungchung biathuk [A]hna hi ka chim ta [D]ko mu..

fields.title: Na Sunparnak A Si Ahcun
fields.verse 1: [E]Ka chim hlan in ka herhmi thil Bawipa na [C#m]hngalh dih ca le kan hal hlan [A]in ka duhmi thil na hngalh dih [F#m]ko ca[B]ah ka chambau[E]nak ratpi lo in, thangthat [C#m]kan pek Bawipa na sunpar[A]nak a si ah[F#m]cun, na duhnak ka cung tlung [B]seh..Caan tam[A]pi Na khuakhannak hi theihthiam har ko [E]hmanhseh, caan tam[A]pi ka tonmi thil hi tuar awk har hmanh [B]seh
fields.verse 2: [E]Ka tuah hlan in ka ruahmi thil Bawipa na [C#m]hngalhdih cah le ka thawh hlan [A]in ka kalnak ding na hngalh dih [F#m]ko ca[B]ah, phuhrunnak [E]zei hmanh umlo in ka sining [C#m]dihlak kan pek na sunpar[A]nak a si ah[F#m]cun na duhnak ka [B]cung tlung seh, Caan tam[A]pi Na khuakhannak hi theihthiam har ko [E]hmanhseh, caan tam[A]pi ka tonmi thil hi tuar awk har hmanh [B]seh
fields.verse 3: Lei harnak [A]chungin  ka nun luat ter ding kan hal lo Vawlei [B]chawva in ka nun lawmhter ding kan hal lo siseh [A]tuarzia thiamnak thinlung ruahnak run ka [E]pe, mitha[A]lo hna kutchung in luatter ding kan hal lo Dotu hna [B]cungah leh rul cham ding in kan hal lo inkhawhnak [A]thazaang le ngaihthiamnak thinlung ka [B]pe
fields.chorus: Ka mitthli tlak[E]nak hna le lung[B]kuainak nih na [C#m]sin an ka phanhter a dermi ka [F#m]thazaang nih [A]na hmai an kan [B]kunter, ka ta an [E]si cang tiah ka [B]ruahmi hna lak[C#m]than an si zongah na sunpar[A]nak a si ahcun Bawipa na [Am]duhnak ka [B]cung ah tlung [E]seh..

fields.title: Holh Chuah An Hmang
fields.verse 1: [G]Ka lungretheih le [D]vansan Caan ah zei[C]zong tuah kho [D]tu Jesuh Khrih fuhlo [G]in, [Em]ka minung hawi ka [C]fuh theu hna sihmanhseh law ka thilrit [G]chawng kho[C] tu ding [D]ahohmanh ka hmu [G]hna lo..
fields.verse 2: [G]Zawtfah le damlo [D]caan zongah damter [C]kho tu Bawi, [D]Jesuh khrih tu fuhlo [G]in, [Em]hi vawlei sibawi [C]tha hna le, sizung tha tha ka fuh tawn [G]hna, Hmanh[C]sehlaw [D]damnak tling ka hmu kho [G]lo..
fields.verse 3: [G]Ka mithli a luan [D]caan hna le ka thin[C]lung kuai caan [D]ah Jesuh khrih fuhlo [G]in, [Em]rual le chan le hawi[C]kom unau hna tu kha ka fuh panh tawn [G]hna, hmanh[C]seh thinlung [D]hnem kho tu an um[G]lo..
fields.verse 4: [G]Lei le rai he ka [D]um caan le sunghza[C]thlak caan ah J[D]esuh khrih tu fuhlo [G]in, [Em]lei ah mirum le [C]milianngan tu kha fuh in ka panh tawn [G]hna, hmanh[C]seh a [D]ka bawm kho tu an um[G]lo..
fields.chorus: [Em]Hi vawlei cung i [D]U le nau daw[C]tu kan ti mi [G]cu bawmh khawh [Am]caan hmanh ah holh [A]chuah an hmang [D]than tawn, Bawm[G]tu a si kan timi [Am]hmanh, lung re[Em]theih petu an cang [Bm]tawn, si[C]hmanhsehlaw Je[A]suh Khrih dawtnak [D]cu, a [G]lak tein dawtu a [Am]si, kan [Em]thilrit chawngtu bawi a [Bm]si, kan [C]harsatnak a [D]kan hrawmpitu bawi a [G]si..
fields.ending chorus: kan [C]harsatnak a [D]kan hrawmpitu bawi a [Bm]si..kan [C]harsatnak a [D]kan hrawmpitu bawi a [G]si..

fields.title: Bawipa Na Tha
fields.verse 1: [E]A kan bawmtu le kelvengtu Bawipa a kut[A]chung lawngah hnangamnak a [E]um, ruah surlo in mangtam zong tlung hmanh[B]seh, ti le [E]rawl in, khim [A]tein a kan [E]cawm Bawipa cu, kan [B]ca'h a tha tuk [E]e..
fields.verse 2: [E]Kan ton mi kip hi a thluachuah an si, Bawipa [A]he cun thil zeizong a [E]tling, a zumtu caah vanchiatnak a um[B]lo, thihpi [E]tlak cu Bawi[A]pa lawng lawng a [E]si, na vel hi kan [B]caah a za [E]ee..
fields.verse 3: [E]Tlangsang horkuang chungah kal hmanhning law, Bawipa [A]cu ka caah thazang a [E]si, mupi bangin vansang ah kan zuang [B]lai, hi lei [E]ramah thlarau [A]nih hruaimi kan si, lei le van ro[B]sung cotu kan [E]si.
fields.chorus: [E]Nangmah hlei in daw[A]tu dang ka ngei[E]lo nangmah lawng kan duh [B]ee, mi tling[E]lo le mi cham[A]bau a kan daw[E]tu, Bawipa cu kan [B]ca'h a tha a [E]tha..
fields.ending chorus: Bawipa cu kan ca'h a tha a tha..

fields.title: Ka Sining Tein
fields.verse 1: ([G]Ka sining [D]tein [C]nang kan [G]biak,[C]tlinglo [G]le cham[Am]bau bu[D]in, [G]ka sual[D]nak ngaih[C]chih bu[G]in, na [Am]kehram [D]ah ka [G]Ra)2 [G]Jesuh ka zei [D]zong, ka [Bm]zei[Em]zong, ka [C]zeizong [G]jesuh nang [C]na [G]si, Jesuh ka zei[D]zong, ka [Bm]zei[Em]zong, ka [C]zeizong [D]nang na [G]si.
fields.verse 2: [G]Jesuh nang [D]cu ka [C]lungpi na [G]si,J[C]esuh nang cu,ka [Am]dornak na [D]si, [G]jesuh nang [D]lawng,ka [C]hnangam[G]nak, ka him[Am]nak bawi[D]pa na [G]si,[G]Jesuh ka zei [D]zong, ka [Bm]zei[Em]zong, ka [C]zeizong [G]jesuh nang [C]na [G]si, Jesuh ka zei[D]zong, ka [Bm]zei[Em]zong, ka [C]zeizong [D]nang na [G]si.
fields.verse 3: [G]Jesuh nang [D]cu ka [C]damnak na [G]si, J[C]esuh nang cu ka [Am]luatnak na [D]si, [G]Jesuh nang [D]lawng ka [C]teinak na [G]si, Ka nun[Am]chung nang [D]lawng kan biak [G]lai, [G]Jesuh ka zei [D]zong, ka [Bm]zei[Em]zong, ka [C]zeizong [G]jesuh nang [C]na [G]si, Jesuh ka zei[D]zong, ka [Bm]zei[Em]zong, ka [C]zeizong [D]nang na [G]si..
fields.chorus: [G]Thlarau thiang[D]hlim,a [Bm]thiang[Em]hlim,A [C]thianghlim ka [G]thawnnak nang [C]na [G]si,thlarau thiang[D]hlim,a [Bm]thiang[Em]hlim ka [C]thawnnak [D]nang na [G]si.
fields.ending chorus: [G]Ka sining [D]tein [C]nang kan [G]biak,[C]tlinglo [G]le cham[Am]bau bu[D]in, [G]ka sual[D]nak ngaih[C]chih bu[G]in, na [Am]kehram [D]ah ka [G]Ra

fields.title: Then khawh lo duh dawtnak
fields.verse 1:
[g]A ka ser ka in, nihin ni [d]tiang a ka cawm [Em]zungzal tu, ei [C]awk din awk hnipuan tha [Am]tlamtling thlua[D]chuah petu, 
 Hi vaw[G]lei harsatnak chung[D]in a ka bawm [Em]zungzal tu, lam [C]hruaitu le huhphengtu, [Am]teinak tha[D]zang petu, amah [G]kaltak dingin micheu [D]nih rak ka tlerh [Em]hna hmanhseh, Bawi[C]pa na dawtnak [G]sung cu kan zamtak [D]kho lai lo
fields.verse 2: Hi vaw[G]lei harsatnak chung[D]in a ka bawm [Em]zungzal tu, lam [C]hruaitu le huhphengtu, [Am]teinak tha[D]zang petu, amah [G]kaltak dingin micheu [D]nih rak ka tlerh [Em]hna hmanhseh, Bawi[C]pa na dawtnak [G]sung cu kan zamtak [D]kho lai lo
fields.chorus:
[Bm]A ho nih dah khrih dawtnak he cun a [Em]kan then khawh lai, thihnak [C]nih maw siseh, nunnak [Am]nih maw siseh a ho [D]hmanh nih then kho lai lo, 
 Khuaruahhar duh[G]dawtnak a nunnak tiang [Em]pekin khamhtu bawi lianngannak [C]sunparnak kaltak in, misual bik [Am]keimah khamh awk [D]ah, then khawh lo duh[G]dawtnak a nunnak tiang [Em]pekin tlanhtu Bawi, harnak le [C]rawltamnak si hna seh, hremnak le [Am]teminnak [D]siseh, then khawh lo duh[G]dawtnak...
fields.ending chorus:
[Bm]A ho nih dah khrih dawtnak he cun a [Em]kan then khawh lai, thihnak [C]nih maw siseh, nunnak [Am]nih maw siseh a ho [D]hmanh nih then kho lai lo, 
 Khuaruahhar duh[G]dawtnak a nunnak tiang [Em]pekin khamhtu bawi lianngannak [C]sunparnak kaltak in, misual bik [Am]keimah khamh awk [D]ah, then khawh lo duh[G]dawtnak a nunnak tiang [Em]pekin tlanhtu Bawi, harnak le [C]rawltamnak si hna seh, hremnak le [Am]teminnak [d]siseh, then khawh lo duh[G]dawtnak...

fields.title: Ka Thlacamnak
fields.verse 1: [Eb]Bawipa thlichia le tilet ka ton[Bb]ter hla mu ti hi [Eb]cu ka thlacamnak a si hrimhrim [Bb]lo e, thli[Fm]chia lilet cu tong hmanhning Bawi[Ab]pa, mupi bang[Eb]in thazang lak zia tu ka thiamter mu [Bb]Bawipa, [Eb]nun tam ka ngeihter, [Ab]thawnnak thar ka [Eb]pe [Cm]cu cu ka [Bb]thlacamnak a [Eb]si..
fields.verse 2: [Eb]Bawipa dotu le raltu ka ton[Bb]ter hlah mu ti [Eb]hi cu ka thlacamnak a si hrimhrim [Bb]lo e, do[Fm]tu le raltu hna sinah Khrih[Ab]nun na khuaiti[Eb]zu, a thlum bik mi cu pek khawh nun ka [Bb]ngeihter, [Eb]huatu hna sinah [Ab]dawtnak pangpar [Eb]dawh, rim [Cm]hmui bik cu langh[Bb]ter ka duh [Eb]Bawipa..
fields.verse 3: [Eb]Bawipa aw zawt le fahnak ka ton[Bb]ter hlah mu [Eb]ti hi ka thlacamnak a si hrimhrim [Bb]lo ee, [Fm]sihmanhsehlaw zawt le fahnak chung[Ab]in Sibawi [Eb]lianngan na si zia tu kha, mikip nih hmu [Bb]hna seh, [Eb]ka vuivai lai lo, [Ab]ka hrum ai lai lo, [Cm]nangmah sunpar[Bb]nak ding a si [Eb]ahcun.
fields.verse 4: [Eb]Bawipa aw har le sa in cun ka [Bb]chia hlah mu ti [Eb]hi cu, ka thlacamnak a si hrimhrim [Bb]lo e, si[Fm]hmanhsehlaw har le sarnak chung[Ab]in tumcop Pa[Eb]thian na si zia  tu kha na langhter tawn [Bb]Bawipa, [Eb]na ka pek thluachuah ka [Ab]can tawk [Eb]ahhin lung[Cm]si hnangam zia [Bb]tu ka thiamter[Eb] mu..
fields.chorus: [Bb]Jordan tilet pi cu ka hrialter [Eb]hin hlah, [Ab]Jordan tilet chungah na kutin ka [Eb]hruai, [Bb]thlichia tilet cu zumtu nun than[Eb]tertu, [Ab]kan nun thannak camin[Fm]puai pi cu [Bb]a si, zan khua[Ab]mui ton lo [Eb]in cun, zing niceu kan hmu [Bb]kho lo, harnak [Fm]thlichia le tilet ton lo in [Ab]cun, thluachuah nun [Bb]duhnung co khawh a si [Eb]lo..
fields.ending chorus: harnak [Fm]thlichia le tilet ton lo in [Ab]cun, thluachuah nun [Bb]duhnung co khawh a si [Eb]lo..

fields.title: Lawmh Caan I Lawmh Cu A Fawi Ko
fields.verse 1: [D]Bawipa aw minung ka si bang in [A]mu a caan ah [Bm]cun [D]vui le vai in ka [E]um sual [A]tawn, [D]ka kaa in ka chim lo nain thli [G]tein ka tah caan aa [Gm]um, [D]nang nih [A]na ka hmuh dih [D]ko ....
fields.verse 2: [D]Midang a hnem tawn tu le midang t[A]hazaang petu [Bm]kha, [D]mah nih ton ahcun [E]a har [A]ko, [D]kaa in hnemh cu a fawi nain, nun in [G]hnemtu si a [Gm]har ko [D]thlarau [A]thiang bawmh lo [D]hin cun ...
fields.verse 3: [D]Bawipa aw habakuk bang sungh le [A]zatlaknak chung[Bm]in, [D]nang an thangthattu [E]si ka [A]duh, [D]kan caah na tinhmi thil hi vanchiat[G]nak a si lo [Gm]zia kha [D]nun in [A]pemhtu si ka [D]duh ...
fields.verse 4: [D]Aw thlarau bawmhnak thawngin zei thil [A]ka ton mi poh [Bm]ah, [D]Halelujuah ka [D]ti khawh [A]cang, [D]lei chawva sungh zatlak ruangah mitthli d[G]orkhat hmanh a[Gm]luang lo, [D]thlarau [A]thiang bawmhnak [D]thawngin ....
fields.chorus: [G]Midang nih zoh in an kaa ngiat [D]theu tawn, aw ka tlinglo e ka tling [E]hrim lo [A]e, [D]lawmh caan i lawmh cu aa fawi ko, zatlak [G]caan i  lawmh  [Gm]a har ko [D]zumtu [A]nun ka chambau [D]ee...

fields.title: Zungzal Tiangin
fields.verse 1: [F#]Na dawtnak theilo in ka rak [B]vai tawn, na hmai ah [F#]duhdim [G#m]nun ka ngei[C#]lo, thihnak lawng [F#]kei ca'h in dingmi [B]a si, zungzal thi [F#]ding [C#]cu ka ruatngam [F#]lo..
fields.verse 2: [F#]Vawlei chawva le pardawhnak [B]hna hi lawmhnak tling[F#]ah ka [G#m]rak ruahsual [C#]tawn, vawlei lawmh[F#]nak cu a ziam zau [B]lai i, Pathian dawtnak [C#]cu zungzal a [F#]hmun..
fields.verse 3: [F#]Ka ruat tawn vawlei lawmhnak le [B]chawva nih na dawt[F#]nak aa [G#m]thleng kho hnga [C#]maw, minung dawt[F#]nak le Pathian dawt[B]nak cu mi ho nih [F#]dah a[C#] tahchun khawh [F#]hnga...
fields.chorus: [F#]Bawipa ka [B]thinlung, ka nunnak [F#]vialte atu na [C#]sinah, ka rak in [F#]chanhthan, ka sining [B]vialte nangmah ca'h [F#]lawngah zungzal, zung[C#]zal tiang ka hman cang [F#]lai..
fields.ending chorus: ka sining [B]vialte nangmah ca'h [F#]lawngah zungzal, zung[C#]zal tiang ka hman cang [F#]lai..

fields.title: Merem cang lai
fields.verse 1: [F#]Ka ruatthan hlan lio nang he kan tuanbia [B]hi, zei ruang [F#]hen hi tluk lung[G#m]fah in kan tian [C#]hnga, kan kar [F#]lak theihthiamlonak uhtanhnak ruan[B]ah maw thih tian [F#]silo kan lam [C#]ai dang ruang [F#]mang hi ..
fields.verse 2: [F#]Tonthannak ni caan hngak in chunmang kan [B]that, dawt nang [F#]he khikhi kha[G#m]kha kan tuah lai [C#]tin, zan[F#]tim thlavang tangah dawtnak bia cu [B]ruatin fingrei [F#]cah hmanh theih manh lo in [C#]a rak sunglawi [F#]ee ...
fields.verse 3: [F#]Caan khatkhat ah ruah loin i ton sual ah[B]cun na lung[F#]kil thli ten duh [G#m]dawtnak bia kan phai [C#]mi kha ruatthan [F#]in kei he zungzal nun hrawm ding in na [B]ti hnga, mangtha [F#]mu lengdang tang pom ve [C#]cang na ti lai [F#]dah ....
fields.chorus: [F#]Nikhat khat [B]ah cun thinlung puan [F#]bang a tharthan lai hlan lio [G#m]kan caan hna ruat [C#]in, khi tikah [F#]cun na tum val[B]pa he, tling khan [F#]dang cungah semmawng nau [C#]he merem cang [F#]lai .....

fields.title: Ser Thar Mi Ka Si
fields.verse 1: [D]Maw bawipa ka nun hi na min sung [G]hi a chiat ter [D]tawn, midang caah thluachuah pe[Bm]tu nun [E]cu vung chim lo[A]in, [D]ngaihchiat lung donghnak le zawtfahnak [G]petu men ka [D]si, na laksawng cu ka co [Bm]nain ka nun [D]nih a [A]phur kho hrim [D]lo .....
fields.verse 2: [D]Vawlei sunparnak le min thannak [G]lawng hi ka duh [D]i, ka fimnak le ka thiamnak [Bm]in bawi[Em]pa ka kawl theu [A]tawn, ka bia [D]chim ka nun hi thawngtha bia [G]he a ralchan [D]e, ka nun ah zeihmanh hmuh awk um[Bm]lo mi ca[D]ah ka [A]nung kho bal [D]lo ....
fields.verse 3: [D]Maw bawipa na hmai ah sual thilrit [G]he ka rak kun [D]i, ka lungthin sual riantuannak [Bm]hi nang [Em]nih ka teipiak [A]law, ka der[D]thawm bik lio ah thawnnak tlam[G]tling hung ka pe [D]law, ka caah ka dornak lung[Bm]pi ka tha[D]zaang thawn[A]nak hung si [D]ko..
fields.chorus: Ser[G]thar mi si ka [A]herh Bawi[D]pa, thawngtha bia mei certertu ah rian[E]sung na ka pek [A]i, ka mi[D]nung ceunak hi na thawnnak [G]in ka teipiak [D]law ka chungah thlarau thawnnak [Bm]in ka thuam [D]law ka [A]ngeihter than [D]ko ...:

fields.title: Siang Bah Tingtang
fields.verse 1: [E]Tlengkhat thu vanva [B]bang [A]siang bah  tingtang tum [E]in zaihla dawh sak tawn[B]nak runchum [A]tual le maw thing [B]riangmang [E]e, nang hnu ah kei lawng [B]in tuar a [A]har e semmawng [F#m]nau bang mitthli he kei ka tlei kho [B]lo, tluang[C#m]dang liam na ser hnu cun nang zuun[G#m]ngaih zaihla dawh he ka cung [A]thlapa var tang[F#m]ah siang bah tingtang he na mui thlam hlam [B]tawn maw ..
fields.verse 2: [E]Lennak tlangdan ruang [B]le [A]thennak caan sau ruang[E]ah lungdang na ngei sual hnga [B]maw, kei cu [A]kan hngah ee tian [B]lai na bia tiam [E]bang kum le caan liam hmanh[B]seh liam ni [A]ser lai lo dawtnak na [F#m]biatiam le merh zimziam na muitlam [B]kha tluangdang [C#m]liam na ser hnu cun nang zuun[G#m]ngaih zaihla dawh he kan cung [A]thlapa var tang ah siang bah [F#m]tingtang he na muithlam leng [B]tawn e .....
fields.ending chorus: Zankhua [F#]nih a hung tlai [C#]i tingtang [D#m]aw nih khing riang[A#m]mang na mui[B]thlam a leng ti [F#]lo siang bah [G#m]tingtang aw dawh [C#]he nang zuun[F#]ngaih zaihla [C#]sa in zei caan [D#m]maw ka hram rih [A#m]lai kir cang [B]law kei sin [F#]ah dawtnak [G#m]zaihla sa [C#]ding in siang bah [B]tingtang [C#]he kan [F#]hngah
fields.chorus: [E]Zankhua nih a hung [B]tlai i tingtang [C#m]aw nih khing [G#m]riangmang na mui[A]thlam a leng ti [E]lo, siang bah [F#m]tingtang aw dawh [B]he nang zuun[E]ngaih zaihla [B]sa in zei caan [C#m]maw ka hram rih [G#m]lai kir cang [A]law kei sin [E]ah dawtnak [F#m]zaihla sa ding [B]in siang bah [A]tingtang [B]he kan [E]hngah

fields.title: Kapa kan hlam tawn
fields.verse 1: June thla nih a chuakthan hriangtu pa le ni a hun chuak than parpang an tonh i maw ka pa zuunthing ngaihnak nih  chuakthan hoi  cang,tuanphung bang chim tawn mi June thla cu zuunngaihnak thla an ti kai zumh lo nain maw kapa zuun cu June thla nih hun phurh than hoi
fields.verse 2: Fanu fapa kong khuakhan caan lairel caan a hun chuak cun, kapa kha um sehlaw lungkil in kan hlam khuakhan lairel thiam kapa aw ka thaazaang hrimhbna si hawi sin ah na fa min nai chor tawn hawihmai khap lo tiang ka fa pa na ti mi chorh len  ser tu kapa .
fields.chorus: Lung a fak tuk tawn, chiat ni that caan ah hung hnem tu kaa pa nang na bau fah hi chiatpitu aa bau lawmhpitu aa bau ka pa kan hlam tawn thli biapi tawn caan ruahnak chuahpitu kan hlam tawn kapa ...

fields.title: Ka hngahhlang ram zion
fields.verse 1: [D]Maw bawipa na dawt[A]nak kong ka [G]ruah zawnah [D]hin, ka thinlung [Bm]le ruahnak [A]nih hin a [G]phan kho hrim[D]lo, hi vaw[G]lei mi hna [D]nih cun mifim [A]mirum mithiam sang hna cu [G]an upat i an dawt tawn [D]hna, sihmanhseh ka pa na [A]umnak ding [G]ramnuam ah [D]cun mi zeihmanh thlei[Bm]dan aum ti [A]lai lo lungkhat [G]in kan leng cang [D]lai ee
fields.verse 2: [D]Van jerusalam [A]thar kan phak [G]tikah cun [D]mu, sifak [Bm]santlailo [A]hnuchit a [G]um ti lai [D]lo, ngaihchiat [G]tahai hramnak [D]zong a um [A]ti lai lo mithiang mi hna  [G]lennak ram vancung khua ah [D]cun, mifim le mirum [A]bang mi nau[G]ta hna zong [D]hi kan leng ve cang [Bm]lai, thawhthannak [A]ram kan i [G]ruahchan mi [D]ramah ..
fields.verse 3: [D]Minung hawi theihpi [A]lo mi kan [G]ngaihchiatnak [D]le kan tuar[Bm]nak kan hram[A]nak kan chim [G]ngamlo mi vial[D]te zungzal [G]kan umnak [D]ding ram jesuh [A]sunparnak ramnuam kan phak [G]tikah cun vawlei harnak [D]hi maw ka pa na kan [A]lakpiak dih [G]cang hna lai [D]i, kan mitthli [Bm]vialte zong hnawh[A]piak in na pawng [G]ah kan leng [D]cang lai ..
fields.chorus: Ka hngah[G]hlang ram [D]zion phak lai[A] ka hngahhlang tuk e, bawi je[G]suh dawtnak tangnem chungah [D]cun, thilthuam [F#m]khatin kan [G]leng cang [D]lai thleidan[A]nak Hi leiram nun kaltak [G]in thleidan umlo nakram [D]nuam, phak [F#m]lai kaa hngalhlang [G]tuk hringhran [D]e (ka bawi [F]nunnem jes[A]uh pawng ah [D]cun )2

fields.title: Ka Dawt Tap Ti Hlah
fields.verse 1: Dawtmi sunghno na nu nih na dawtmi nunnem cu nang zuun in nitin zantin a tap e an ti cun, kei thinlung a tur dawt kan ngaihnak a zual chin kan i ton cun tintling cungah duh bia kan phai lai mu , Aw dawtmi nang kan ngaihnak nunnem nang kan dawtnak alang par men dawtnak tin zumhlo in um hlah law kei cu e dawtmi hmuhlo khuachin tluangdang ah hmailei ca tei ka rak rial rih lai lungsauin ka hngak rih mu
fields.verse 2: Aw dawtmi na ta kei nih zaihla in bia in cah ve ning i tonnak ding caan sau pi hmanh seh na len hawi sin ah khen, partha dawh hna le ankaa tha rak tam hmanhseh kei cu dawtmi ka ngei cang tiah an bia rak el hna mu ...
fields.chorus: Kei zong dawt nang zuun ngaih in nau bang ka hram tawn duhtluk in kan rak chawn kho lo na ta ka ngaithiam law, tuzan cu nunnem phone chung online tetu in zan khuadei tiang kan chawnh ko lai ka dawt tap ti hlah mu...
fields.ending chorus: Kei zong dawt nang zuun ngaih in nau bang ka hram tawn duhtluk in kan rak chawn kho lo na ta ka ngaithiam law, tuzan cu nunnem phone chung online tetu in zan khuadei tiang kan chawnh ko lai ka dawt tap ti hlah mu...

fields.title: Titsa Raldoh A Har Ko
fields.verse 1:
[D]Aw ka van a sang hringhran dah, ka titsa nun raldoh hi a va har [G]hringhran dah ka Bawi [D]nunnem, keimah mitchung i a um mi thingtan [A]chuahlo in cun, zei[D]tindah midang mitchung um mi mithnawm cu ka chuahpiak khawh hna hnga [G]mu, ka Bawi nun[D]nem na tehte [A]tha si hi, a [G]har ko mu, thlarau [A]thiang nang tello [D]cun..
 [D]Aw ka van a sang hringhran dah, ka titsa nun raldoh hi a va har [G]hringhran dah ka Bawi [D]nunnem, ka thinlung le ruahnak thianglo sualnak [A]khualipi hi, tei [D]in thianh hmasat lo cun zeitindah midang nunnak cu ka sersiam [G]khawh hna hnga [D]Bawipa, na tehte [A]tha si hi, a [G]har ko mu thlarau [A]thiang nang tello [D]cun...
fields.verse 2: [D]Aw ka van a sang hringhran dah, ka titsa nun raldoh hi a va har [G]hringhran dah ka Bawi [D]nunnem, Na sunparnak langhtertu le na min[A]thantertu ah kei[D] cu ka si kho hrim lo Bawipa na minchiattertu le na ram mui[G]chiattertu [D]menmen ka rak si [A]ko hi maw, aww [G]thlarau thiang ka [A]sersiamthan ko [D]mu
fields.verse 3: [D]Aw ka van a sang hringhran dah, ka titsa nun raldoh hi a va har [G]hringhran dah ka Bawi [D]nunnem,Ka hmur ka le leidang ven zia ka thiam [A]hrimhrim lo ee , mi[D]dang nun ramchung si ko ka nunram mui chungah mission [G]tuan ding , rian ngan ka [D]ngei , aww Thlarau [A]thianghlim aww ka [G]nun khuamui ceuter[A]tu si ka [D]duh
fields.chorus: [D]Nundawh le nunduh nung ngeih [G]ka duh, sisehlaw ka si kho hrim [D]lo e, aww thlarau [A]thiang hlim nang tello [D]cun,ka thinlung nih cun a theih [G]nain nun in ka langhter kho [D]hrim hrim lo, chung sivang in [A]ka hram ruangmang [G]tawn ee,  titsa [A]raldoh a har [D]ko..

fields.title: A Vel Thawngin
fields.verse 1: [F]Tuzing khuaceu dawh le ni ceu[C]dawh le thlithiang [F]hi fimnak thawnnak le rum [Dm]ruangah ka [Gm]hmuh mi a si[C]lo, dawtnak [F]in a khat pathian a vel [Bb]thawngin ka tin co ve a [F]si kan din ei tirawl vial[Dm]te a [C]thlachuah nak an [F]si
fields.verse 2: [F]Ih phah thatha le puai lum hna [C]cu cawk khawh an [F]si, hmanhseh mitkuh thaw ten [Dm]hngilh khawhnak cawk [Gm]khawh asi [C]lo, buh thaw[F]thaw le meh thawthaw hna cu [Bb]phaisa in cawk khawh a si [F]nain ei kaa thawt le paw khim [Dm]khawh ka [C]pa a vel a [F]si ...
fields.verse 3: [F]Bawipa thlachuah relthiam nun cu [C]lawmhnak in an [F]khat, zawtfah tuarin kan hram [Dm]tawn hmanhseh [Gm]dam caan a sau [C]deuh lei hling [F]nih kan chunh tawn hmanhseh [Bb]mithmuh khawh lo lawmhnun kan [F]ngei tuarnak lei ah hram hmanh[Dm]sih tlin[C]nak vanram kan [F]cuan
fields.chorus: [C]Minung nih ka ruah lem [F]lo mi zeihmanh [Bb]ah kan rel lem [F]lo mi kan nun dam a man tam zia hngilh khawh[Bb]nak ei kaa thawtnak kan hngalh [F]lo kar ah kan hrai [Dm]cu a [C]vel thawng in a [F]liam ..

fields.title: Abraham Fapa
fields.verse 1: [A]Abraham fapa [D]ngeihchun a dawt [A]Isak [D]pathian nih moriah [A]tlang ah raithawinak [Bm]dingah cun a hal[E]than zei[A]tlukin aa har hnga a [D]dawt fahniang ngai[A]te [D]raithawinak tuah ding a [A]ruah ah a pa [E]lungfah zeilawh hnga [A]mu, [A]Nilin lamchosang ah [D]fapa dawt Isak [A]cu [D]raithawinak ding thing[A]hreu i put buin [Bm]moriah tlang lei an [E]panh a [A]dawt fapa sianlo [D]mei le nam i put [A]in [D]then lai a ruah ah [A]minung asi bang a [E]pa a celh hrim [A]lo ....
fields.verse 2: [A]Moriah tlang an phanh cun [D]sianlo fapa [A]isak [D]raithawinak ding caan [A]le suimilam cu a [Bm]hung tling zuah mah [E]cang, pa [A]bia el lo fapa [D]isak thinlung [A]chungah [D]sunghno nu hmuhlo [A]liam lai a ruah ah [E]lungfah a celh hrim [A]lo ..
fields.verse 3: [A]A pa thinlung chungah a [D]fa cu aa thi [A]cang [D]Abraham thin[A]lung put a hmuh ah [Bm]Pathian a lung a [E]tling, [A]harnak pin lei lawmhnak [D]pathian kutcak [A]ai phuang [D]fapa ai-awh ah [A]tufa thih kha bawi[E]pa nih a co hlan[A]piak .....
fields.ending chorus: [A]Abraham bang[D]in zumhfehnak naa ngeih [A]cun pathian kha na cung ah a [Bm]lung a tling ko [E]lai, a [A]ram kauhnak caah na chaw le va ui [D]hlah a herh cun kawm tang na [A]hren sathil zong a [E]hri phawih law pe [A]ko a [D]herh cun komtang na [A]zuat sathil zong a [E]hri phawih law pe [A]ko .....
fields.chorus: [A]Isak nih cun ka [D]pa mei le thing kan Ken [A]tung thawinak ding tufa ta [Bm]khoi ah hen a si [E]kun, fa[A]pa aw aa theih ah a pa a celh hrim[D]lo ka fa bawipa nih a [A]khan te ko lai [E]tiin thinlung hnem [A]e.

fields.title: Chungkhar Mission
fields.verse 1: [E]Maw Jerusalem leng dawh vialte hna, [A]keimah caah tap hlah [E]uh, nanmah le chungkhar ca'h [B]tap uh, Je[E]suh Khrih biacah kan kheng kho rua lo, kan [A]ram zumtu hna [E]nih, chungkhar [B]mission tuan kan philh [E]dih cang..
fields.verse 2: [E]Ka dawtmi unau tha tein ruat hmanh uh, [A]Van inn kan tlun [E]tikah, ram hla pi kan kawl thlarau fa [B]hna, an [E]mui kan hmuh lai siseh kan chungchuak fa[A]nu le  fapa [E]hna van ah an [B]mui kan hmu te hnga [E]maw?
fields.verse 3: [E]Miphun dang sin le holhphun dang ram ah [A]mission rian kan tuan [E]lio ah, Kan inn pa thlarau kan kaltak [B]maw? Ju[E]dah tlangbawi le levi pa bangin hnu[A]lei kan chit dih [E]hna, an thi[B]sen cawh kan si te lai..
fields.verse 4: [E]Cu a si caah zumtu u le nau tha [A]tein ruatthan hmanh [E]uh, kan pawngkam ah chanchuah ding an [B]tam, kan [E]ngeihchia chawva thlacamnak hriam le [A]thazang chuah cio [E]in, lungkhat [B]in tuanti cang hna u[E]sih..
fields.chorus: [A]Tappi lungthu mission chuahtak [E]in , ram hla pi i [F#m]thlarau kan kawl lio [B]ah, kan ke[E]hram teah fanu kan kaltak, fa[A]pa kan thlau [E]dih hna, chungkhar [B]mission tuan kan philh dih [E]cang..
fields.ending chorus: chungkhar [B]mission tuan kan philh dih [E]cang...

fields.title: Van Zion
fields.verse 1: [B]Van zion fanu fapa rualhna tho u[E]sih Bawipa thangthat usih, kan tha[B]zang dihlak chuahin lam u[F#]sih, kan Pa[B]thian thangthat hi a tha bik kan Pa[E]thian thangthat hi a nuam bik, thangthat [B]tlak Jesuh [G#m]Khrih, [B]thangthat uh, thangthat uh, [F#]thangthat chin uh Cungnung bik [B]Bawi
fields.verse 2: [B]Micheu nih thangthat duhlo hmanhseh kan nih [E]cu kan thangthat chinchin lai, van [B]zion hlathar sa in kan lam [F#]lai, kan Pa[B]thian thangthat hi a tha bik kan Pa[E]thian thangthat hi a nuam bik, thangthat [B]tlak Jesuh [G#m]Khrih, [B]thangthat uh, thangthat uh, [F#]thangthat chin uh Cungnung bik [B]Bawi
fields.verse 3: [B]Kan damnak kan sibawi ngan bik le kan khamh[E]nak kan biaceih bawi ngan bik, kan dam, [B]kan luatnak bawi cu, thangthat [F#]uh,  kan Pa[B]thian thangthat hi a tha bik kan Pa[E]thian thangthat hi a nuam bik, thangthat [B]tlak Jesuh [G#m]Khrih, [B]thangthat uh, thangthat uh, [F#]thangthat chin uh Cungnung bik [B]Bawi
fields.chorus: Sang chin [F#]ah hlor uh zeizong sertu [B]Bawi cu, Pathian hna Pathian cu hlorh chin u[F#]sih, kan damnak le kan [B]zeizong, kan [E]zeizong kan [B]zeizong [F#]Bawipa cu thangthat chin [B]usih,
fields.ending chorus: Sang chin ah hlor uh zeizong sertu Bawi cu, Pathian hna Pathian cu hlorh chin usih, kan damnak le kan zeizong, kan zeizong kan zeizong Bawipa cu thangthat chin usih, Sang chin [F#]ah hlor uh zeizong sertu [B]Bawi cu, Pathian hna Pathian cu hlorh chin u[F#]sih, kan damnak le kan [B]zeizong, kan [E]zeizong kan [B]zeizong [F#]Bawipa cu thangthat chin [B]usih,

fields.title: Pakhat fa
fields.verse 1: [E]Jacob fa le phun [B]12 cu, nu 4 chungchuak fa [E]an si ca'h, an nu lei tangin [A]an dir cun, u [B]le nau remnak [E]um kho lo, siseh pakhat fa [B]an si ca'h an pa lei tangin [E]an dir cun, chungkhar ah remnak [A]a leng i, doh[B]tu ral tampi [E]zong an tei..
fields.verse 2: [E]Joshua nih a ral[B]kap lakah, a thonghaotu zong a [E]chiah hna, a zaa haotu zong a [A]chiah i, lung[B]khat tein ral [E]an dohti, Pathian pekmi hriam[B]nam ai dang, a kan chiahnak hmun [E]ai dang cio, siseh dawtnak in kan [A]kal cun, kan ral sehtan cu kan tei lai..
fields.verse 3: [E]Moses pekmi hriam[B]nam ai dang, Aron pekmi zong [E]ai dang ve,Meriam pekmi cu [A]khuang a si, an [B]miphun caah [E]pek an si,micheu nih thawngtha [B]an chim i, micheu zong nih thla[E]za an cam, micheu nih thil pek[A]in an tuan, kan [B]Pathian ram ca[E]ah a si..
fields.chorus: Kan [A]ram zumtu kan dihlak hi kan [E]nu Khrifabu lei tangin, kan [B]dir i tan kan lak ahcun, u [E]le nau remnak a um lai lo, Hring[A]tu kan pa Jesuh lei ah kan [E]dihlak in kan [C#m]tan ahcun, dawt[F#m]nak le remnak a [B]leng lai i, kan [E]ral sehtan cu kan tei lai, [A]dawtnak [E]in, [B]kan kal [C#m]lai, [A]kutsih [E]in [B]kan tuan [E]lai...

fields.title: Misual Ai Ah
fields.verse 1: [F]Jesuh cu Gesmani Dum Chung[Gm]ah lungrethei ngaiin, [C]ngaihchia ngaiin le awlokchawng[F]in thla a [A]cam, [Dm]ka pa a si khawh cun hi hrai [Gm]hi ka thialpiak ko, [Bb]hmanhseh keimah duh bang [A]silo,nangmah duh bang [Dm]siseh,
fields.verse 2: [F]Jesuh nih vawlei cung i ka [Gm]rak rathnawh tak chan cu, [C]a tlaumi kawl awk le khamh awk [F]ah ka ra a [A]ti,[Dm]thlarau mitcaw mi nih khua an [Gm]hmuh nak ding ca le [Bb]taksa mitvar mi hna [A]mitcaw an can nak ding [Dm]caah,
fields.verse 3: [F]Misual nang le kei nih kan tuar [Gm]ding sualman thihnak cu, [C]vailam cungah a thisen thlet-[F]in a kan thlanh [A]cang, [Dm]kan sualnak leiba cazin cu [Gm]a kan champiak cang a [Bb]thihnak cu misual [A]nang le kei kan luatnak a [Dm]si..
fields.chorus: [F]Sualman thihnak tuar dingmi a [C]biakam cu let-in, [Bb]sualnak ngeilo van bawi [C]kan caah thihnak a [F]tuar, [Gm]serhsat zawmhtaihnak hna le [Dm]fahnak ningzahnak tuarin, [Gm]misual vailam tung put-in, [A]luruh tlang lei ah an hruai, [F]hling luchin an chinh, a [C]hnakah fei in an chunh, [Bb]mitsur hangthur kha an dawp[A]ter, nang le kei a[C]i ah, [Bb]dawtnak ruangah a [C]sung bik mi a [F]nunnak tiang hmanh a [Dm]kan pek chan cu, mi[Bb]sual nang le [C]kei khamh duh ah a [F]si..
fields.ending chorus: [F]Sualman thihnak tuar dingmi a [C]biakam cu let-in, [Bb]sualnak ngeilo van bawi [C]kan caah thihnak a [F]tuar, [Gm]serhsat zawmhtaihnak hna le [Dm]fahnak ningzahnak tuarin, [Gm]misual vailam tung put-in, [A]luruh tlang lei ah an hruai, [F]hling luchin an chinh, a [C]hnakah fei in an chunh, [Bb]mitsur hangthur kha an dawp[A]ter, nang le kei a[C]i ah, [Bb]dawtnak ruangah a [C]sung bik mi a [F]nunnak tiang hmanh a [Dm]kan pek chan cu, mi[Bb]sual nang le [C]kei khamh duh ah a [F]si..

fields.title: Tukhaltha ka ngei
fields.singer: Grace Lian Cung & Duh Tin Tuan
fields.verse 1: [F#]Ka hmailei ka ton ding [B]thil pakhat te [F#]hmanh, kei ka hngalhchung khawhmi, [C#]zei hmanh a um[F#]lo, sihmanhseh fiangte[B]in, ka hngalhmi [F#]cu ka Bawipa Jesuh khrih [C#]nih, [F#]keimah a kaltak hrimhrim [B]lai lo ti hi [F#]cu [B]fiang tein ka [F#]hngalh cia [C#]aww, halelui[F#]ah..
fields.verse 2: [F#]Thaizing kongah kei cu [B]zeihmanh ka [F#]hngallo, sihmanhsehlaw fiangte[C#]in ka hngalhmi [F]cu thaizing a ngeitu, [B]lei le van ser[F#]tu Pathian khi ka Pa a [C#]si, [F#]cucaah thaizing khi keimah [B]caah [F#]thluachuahnak [B]phortu a si te [F#]lai ti [C#]cu fiang tein ka [C#]hngalh
fields.verse 3: [C]Ka khualtlawnnak lamthluan ka [F]ton ding mi [C]zong kei cu pakhat te hmanh ka [G]hngalchung kho [C]lo, sihmanhseh fiangte[F]in ka hngalhmi [C]cu Jesuh ka pawngah a um [G]ko, [C]hmuh khawhmi ral le hmuh khawhlo [f]mi ral phun [C]zakip [F]chungin him te[C]in a [G]ka vengtu a [C]si..
fields.verse 4: [C]Ka hmailei ni le thla [F]le kumthluan [C]chuakin zeitin ka nun lai tin ka [G]hngalchung kho [C]lo, sihmanhseh fiangte[F]in kan hngalhmi [C]cu van a zuang va te hna [G]le [C]ram lak i lily pangpar dawh [F]nakin ka Pa[C]thian [F]nih dawt deuh mi [C]fa ka [G]si fiangtein ka [C]hngalh..
fields.chorus:
'First & Second Chorus' 

[F#]Cuca[B]ah ka hna a [F#]ngam, ka [D#m]nunn[G#m]ak zalam [C#]thluanah, ka [F#]thin a phang hrimhrim lai lo, [B]keh le orh, hnu [F#]hmai, [B]kilh le kamh in [F#]vengtu [C#]tukhaltha ka [F#]ngei...

   'Third & fourth Chorus ' 

 [C]Cuca[F]ah ka hna a [C]ngam, ka nun[Dm]nak zalam thluan[G]ah ka [C]thin a phang hrimhrim lai lo, [F]keh le orh, hnu [C]hmai, [F]kilh le kamh in [C]vengtu [G]tukhaltha ka [C]ngei...

fields.title: A Dong Cang
fields.verse 1: [C#m]Auhlen zongah khirhthan [A]um tilo zalam ton [E]zawnah lamdang [B]ah na pial [C#m]chawnhlen zongah khin lehthan [A]um tilo panchiar[E]mal mithmai dawhte kha [B]khoika hen..kan hlam [C#m]tawn kan ngai [A]e na aw [E]nem ka caah [B]lungkuainak, nang le [C#m]kei kan tuan[A]bia dongh hram [E]a thawk cang rua.....
fields.verse 2: [A]Auhlen [E]zongah zei san[B]tlailo ka [C#m]caah lungkuainak na [A]awnem sivai [E]bang lungfak[B]nak [C#m]rawl ei zong chung pillo [A]ni le thla cu an liam [E]sihmanhseh lungfaknak a [G#m7]dam khawh hlei tunglo [C#m]ngaihchiatnak hla ka sa [A]nang zuun ka ngaih zawnah [E]khua ka ruat tawn e zei ruangah nang he kan i then.....
fields.verse 3: [B]hung kirthan ka ti len [C#m]zongah a dong cang a dong [A]cang zung[B]zal hmun seh ti mi [C#m]tuanbia na biakam cu let [A]in [B]lamdang na pial [C#m]cang sihmanhseh hi lei [A]cu lunglawmhnak a tling kholo kan [B]tuanbia a dong [C#m]cang..
fields.chorus: nang he kan rak [C#m]lenti[A]nak lamthluan tonthan[E]nak caan um hnga [B]maw? kawp ngeilo kei [C#m]lawng thlam[A]hngakva bang lileng [E]in kei lawng [B]ka hram hihi maw lung[C#m]kuai cu [A]a rak si...tuar a har [E]e um ziathiam[B]loin nang he kan rak [C#m]tialti [A]mi tuanbia dongh hram [E]thawk a tim [B]cang rua a dong [C#m/ A]cang.....
fields.ending chorus: mang tha........

fields.title: Tehte Tha
fields.verse 1: [Bb]Ka minung hawi lakah Bawipa [F]santlailo sihmanhning, [Eb]na ca'h tehte tha ka [Bb]siter, hmurka in chimthiam hlah hmanh ning [F]nifa ka nunzia ah, na [Cm7]ca'h zumhtlak saltha ka [Fsus4]siter, [Cm]Ka sining ka zeizong vialte [Gm]Bawipa nang sinah kan pek, [Cm]nangmah duh bangin ka hmang law [Eb]na ca'h zumhtlak saltha ka [F]siter..
fields.verse 2: [Bb]Sermi thil vialte nih Bawipa [F]an in hngalkhawhnak hnga, [Eb]na ca'h tehte tha ka [Bb]siter, hmurka in chimthiam hlah hmanhning [F]nifa ka nunzia ah na [Cm]ca'h zumhtlak saltha ka [F]siter, [Cm]ka sining ka zeizong vialte [Gm]Bawipa nang sinah kan pek, [Cm]nangmah duh bangin ka hmang law, [Eb]na ca'h zumhtlak saltha ka [F]siter..
fields.chorus: Maw Bawipa, [Bb]ka nunnak vialte,nangmah duh [F]bang in ka hmanglaw, na sunpar [Eb]lianngannak le na ram kauh[Cm]nak ding ca[F]ah, Mawi Bawipa [Bb]ka nunchung vialte nangmah duh [Fsus4]bangin ka hruailaw, na sunpar [Eb]lianngannak le na ram kauh[Cm]nak ding [F]caah ka hmang [Bb]ko..
fields.ending chorus: [G] Mawi Bawipa [C]ka nunchung vialte nangmah duh [G]bangin ka hruailaw, na sunpar [C]lianngannak le na ram kauh[Dm]nak ding ca[G]ah, Maw Bawipa, [C]ka nunnak vialte,nangmah duh [G]bang in ka hmanglaw, na sunpar [C]lianngannak le na ram kauh[Dm]nak ding ca[G]ah ka hmang [C]ko..

fields.title: Kan Zangfah Ko
fields.verse 1: [Bb]Chung sivang in ka tap tawn, [Eb]maw ka Bawipa Jesuh [Bb]Khrih aw, na [Eb]duhning in kar ka hlan [Bb]khawhlo zia ka nun nih a [F]theih nain, na [Bb]ka hruainak lam thluanah ka [Eb]nun tahtu le an [Bb]tam tung na [Eb]hmai an hngalhtertu si [Bb]tilo in na [F]min chiattertu ka si [Bb]tawn..
fields.chorus: [F]Ka zangfah ko maw ka Bawi [Bb]Jesuh, tuk[Eb]forhnak pangpar rimhmui lak [Bb]le hneksaknak thlichia tilet [F]lakah, kal[Bb]zia thiamlo ka thiamlo Bawipa na [Eb]kutcak in ka domh tlai [Bb]law, [Eb]keh le orh ah ka [Bb]pialsualnak hngalo [F]thlarau thianghlim ka bawm [Bb]law,
fields.verse 2: [Bb]A caan ah hling le so lak [Eb]zongah na ka kalter [Bb]Bawipa, [Eb]kalzia ka thiamlo ca ka [Bb]hrum ruangmang ka minung [F]sinak in cun, [Bb]hmanhseh ka nun lam thluanah [Eb]keneh dawh le duhnung [Bb]tein [Eb]karhlan zia thiamter na [Bb]ka duh ca [F]hling phahpiaktu zong na [Bb]si..
fields.verse 3: [Bb]A caan ahcun thlichia le [Eb]tilet lak zongah na ka [Bb]hruai [Eb]cuca'h thinphang le thlalau [Bb]in ka um mitthli he tahcaan a [F]tam, [Bb]hmanhseh thase cung silo a [Eb]fek lungpi Jesuh [Bb]khrih chung [Eb]thukpiin hram bunh seh ti, na ka duh [F]i thlichia na ka thlah[Bb]piak..
fields.verse 4: A caan ahcun biathalo, soisel le thangchiatnak tlangah na ka domh i na ka kaipi tawn i ka kai kholo i ka tap, mah le mah i tei khawhnak lei le dang cu hmanzia thiam in khuaitizu le cawhnuk luannak hmundawh, ngeihter na ka duh Bawipa...

fields.title: Ka Hawitha
fields.verse 1: [Eb]Mawi ka Bawipa na [Bb]ka dawtnak sung [Eb]tuk, ka nunnak ca'h na [Fm]nunnak na pek [Bb]hi, ka [Ab]ruah tik[Eb]ah ka [Bb]nun mei bang a [Eb]kang, nangmah ca'h lawngah [Bb]thih tiang nun ka [Eb]duh..
fields.chorus: [Ab]Bawipa nangmah [Eb]tello cun, caan tawi len ding hmanh, ka nun chung si a vang tuk ka [Bb]celhlo, nangmah [Eb]he umti peng hi ka nun [Ab]diriamnak a si, ka [Eb]hawitha bik [Bb]le ka kawitha na [Eb]si
fields.verse 2: [Eb]Nikhat hnu nikhat [Bb]in kan dawtchin Bawi[Eb]pa, na ka dawtnak [Fm]thuk chinchin in ka [Bb]pemh, nang[Ab]mah lo [Eb]cun, [Bb]zero ka si ka [Eb]hngalh, nangmah ca'h lawngah [Bb]thih tiang nun ka [Eb]duh
fields.verse 3: [Eb]Ka nunnak hram na [Bb]si ka hngalh Bawi[Eb]pa, ka thluachuah hram [Fm]na si ka hngalh Bawi[Bb]pa, ka [Ab]hawitha [Eb]bik ka [Bb]nun ngeitu Bawi[Eb]pa nangmah ca'h lawngah [Bb]thih tiang nun ka [Eb]duh..
fields.verse 4: [Eb]Nikhat hnu nikhat [Bb]in kan dawtchin Bawi[Eb]pa, na ka dawtnak [Fm]thuk chinchin in ka [Bb]pemh, nang[Ab]mah lo [Eb]cun, [Bb]zero ka si ka [Eb]hngalh, nangmah ca'h lawngah [Bb]thih tiang nun ka [Eb]duh

fields.title: A fak A Lungdo Hma Bang
fields.verse 1: [C]Lungkil in khuaza ka ruat tawn dawt[F]hniang nang [C]he dawtnak biaphai in hmunkhat len lio [G]caan kha [C]cungkhua nu samhri sih kan si lo ruang[F]ah hin [C]maw kan tiam thlibia zaan[G]mang bang an lo [C]dih
fields.verse 2: [C]Ka tuan zaangtlung kholo khupthi rual[F]hawi sin[C]ah rawl ei chungpil loin zei tiang [G]khi hen nu [C]lo cilio vaa bang fing le tlang[F]kip cul in ka hram rih lai [G]dawthniang nang zuun ngai[C]in...
fields.verse 3: [C]Nang le kei hi dawtnak vanchia kan [F]rak si [C]rua sunghno nu le pa hna lungtlinlo [G]hrat cu kan siang [C]hrim lo ti'n tah len zong san [F]a tlai [C]lo sianlo nunnem [G]dam tein mangtha [C]mu......
fields.chorus: [C]Aw.. khoi ah [F]hen na um mi nunnem [C]te nang zuuntuar[F]in nitin naubang ka [C]tap ka tuar kho[G]lo a fak e lungdo hma [C]bang ....

fields.title: A Fianglo
fields.verse 1: [G]Kan nunchung hmunkhat leng dingin [D]bia cu kan kam na'n, na [Em7]thinlungchung dawtnak zumhtlaklo na [C]si ca na let than, [G]nang le kei kar ah thentu hi a [D]fiang in ka theilo, [Em7]cucaah ka tuarnak hi kei caah a [C]fak khun ee dawtmi a [Cm]fawilo..
fields.verse 2: [G]Theihthiamnak ka chambau cun ka [D]ngaithiam ko dawtmi, [Em7]lungdang her ding cun kei nih [C]kan siang kho hrim lo na [G]lung ka tlinlonak um cun [D]lungthiang in ka chim ko a [Em7]ruang umlo i then ding cu a [C]tuar ngam si hnga maw? a [Cm]fawilo..

fields.title: A Hmunh Ah Cun
fields.verse 1: [D]Dawtnak hi tulhri [A]fek he tahchunh [Bm]sual hlah [G]caan khatkhat ahcun a [Asus4]cat sual hnga ka [A]dawt [D]dawtnak hi [A]pangpar bang parter [Bm]sual hlah [G]ziam caan chuah in a til sual hnga [A]cuailopar hmanh a ziam ka dawt [Bm]caan khat kar dawtnak [F#m7]chikhat te ziam sual [F#m]lai [Em7]ka dawt aw [A]na dawtnak
fields.verse 2: [D]Ka dawt nang he kan [A]lamhmi dawtnak [Bm]vawlei [G]hling le so khat hmanhseh a [Asus4]poi lo nang he [A]cun ka [D]dawt nang he kan [A]phaimi dawtnak [Bm]biathli kan [G]panhmi dawtnak ruuninn ah tling [Asus4]khan dang cung kan phaithan lai [Bm]hmanhseh caan kar ah [F#m7]thal zen bang alh tuan lai [Em7]ti ka phang [Asus4]na dawtnak
fields.verse 3: [Bm]Hmanhseh caan kar ah thal [F#m7]zel bang alh tuan lai [Em7]ti ka phang [A]na dawtnak Oo...Oo...

fields.title: A King

fields.title: A Tluang Ko Nan A Fiang Lo
fields.verse 1:
[D]Um khuahar zawnah kei lawng [Bm]khuaza ruatin [Em7]dawtnak par rimhmui [G]te za[Asus4]i hla nih aa zelh [Bm]khoi in hen hun [Bbaug] chuak ti'n [Bm7]ka thinlung [Ab]zaihla ka [G]nunnak ah hram [F#m7] sih in [G] nang kan dawtnak kei zai[Asus4] hla .. 
[D] Hawi nakin muidawh na [Bm7] sinak zei kan hngallo hawi [Em7]hlei in mi cung[G]cuang na [Asus4]si zong kan hngallo [Bm] hmanhseh mi dang nakin [Bm7] kan dawt cu [E7]ka hngalh ka [G] thinlung mit na [F#m7] hlang khun [G] ka ca ah na sung [A]khun ko
fields.verse 2: [D]Hawi nakin muidawh na [Bm7] sinak zei kan hngallo hawi [Em7]hlei in mi cung[G]cuang na [Asus4] si zong kan hngallo [Bm] hmanhseh mi dang nakin [Bm7] kan dawt cu [E7]ka hngalh ka [G] thinlung mit na [F#m7] hlang khun [G] ka ca ah na sung [A]khun ko
fields.verse 3: [Bm7] Ka khupthi rualhawi hna nih [E7]nang le kei karah [g]sining [A] zeiti'n hal um ai kun zeiti'n ka leh kun hna hnga [Bm] sunghno nu le pa nih [E7] nang le kei kan karah [G]dawtnak zei ti'n hal um ai kun [C] kei nih cun kaan dawt ko na'n a [A]tluang ko na'n a fiang lo kei ca[D]ah.
fields.chorus: [F#7]Phuang cang law kei sinah kan [Bm] dawttuk tiin ka [E] lenrualhawi sinah khin lung[A] si te'n um ve ning [D]lungtuai sivang um hi [Bm7]ka celh hrim ti lo [Em]nang le kei kan kar ah [C]tlaihchannak maw dawtnak a [A]tluang ko na'n a fiang lo kei ca[D]ah.

fields.verse 2: [G]A bau cang [D] ee nanglo [Em]cun a thlumel [D]mi hi lei [C]nun kei ca[G]ah tlei[Am]lo ngaktah [D] bang [G] zaan tim [D] mitthli luang [Em] ee nanglo [D] nun lai ruah[C]ah kei [G] chunmang [Am] zaanmang an lo [D]ral..
