fields.verse 2: Kan hngahhlang tukmi Christmas, kan phanh khawh hi Bawipa dawtnak thawng a si damlo zuuntuar nan um maw, Christmas caan ah kan ca'h nithar a tlan cang..
fields.singer:
Bawi Thiang Bik,
Noami Par Tha Sung
fields.verse 1: Kum le caan, ni le thla nih an liam riangmang khua caan ai thleng i an thar va aw phuntling zaihla le, thingram hna nih hrin hniang chuahcam cu an lawmh cio..
fields.composer:
Bawi Thiang Bik,
Noami Par Tha Sung
fields.chorus:
Par dawh hna nih an par dawhnak bik chuah in khamhtu chuah caan an dawhter misual nang le kei khamhtu Jesuh cu nundawh in lawm cio usih..
Van sunparnak vialte kaltak in misual kan caah, a niambik cawrawl kuang cu ai thim kan caah a sunglawi ee a lianngan ee, Emmanuel lawm cio u kan ca'h a chuak cang..
fields.title: Siangpahrang Jesuh
fields.ending chorus:
Misual khamhtu Bawi, Dam lo hna siibawi sifah hna rumnak Bawipa, ngaihchia mi hnemtu saltang luattertu, Siangpahrang Jesuh a chuak cang..
Van sunparnak vialte kaltak in misual kan caah, a niambik cawrawl kuang cu ai thim kan caah a sunglawi ee a lianngan ee, Emmanuel lawm cio u kan ca'h a chuak cang..

fields.verse 2: Ngaihchia le lungkuai mi hna caah lawmhnak ni a tap i a hram mi hna caah lawmhnak ni, sualsal a tang mi hna caah lawmhnak ni sungbik thongtla mi hna ca'h, luatnak ni sung..
fields.singer:
Rev.Thomas Tial Uk &
 Eunice Bawi Tha Chin
fields.verse 4: Par lak ah rimhmui bik cu Bethlehem pangpar cawrawl kuang chungah duhnung tein aa par cang, van le vawlei cung dihlak in a hmuitertu Pathian le minung remnak sertu..
fields.verse 1: Christmas lawmhnak ni sunglawi bik cu kan phan cang Bethlehem ah Van Bawi fapa Jesuh a chuak, Vansang bik khin Vanmi run nih hla dawh an sa khamhtu Bawi cungnung bik chuah zaan ah..
fields.chorus: A min lian ngan thangthat uh a lianngan bik bawi mi khamhtu Bawi a chuak sualnak khuamui ah tlaumi tuu cu kawl ding in Van Bawi fapa aa chuak cang...
fields.title: Van Bawi fa a chuak cang
fields.ending chorus:
A min lian ngan thangthat uh a lianngan bik bawi mi khamhtu Bawi a chuak sualnak khuamui ah tlaumi tuu cu kawl ding in Van Bawi fapa aa chuak... 

sualnak khuamui ah tlaumi tuu cu kawl ding in (Van Bawi fapa aa chuak cang... )2
fields.verse 3: Hawidawt tukum Christmas nisung lawi hi khuazei ah dah nang na hman lai ti kan in hal semnak lungrawn khua cio panh in kan kal cio hna a sunglawi nisung kan hmang ti cio..

fields.verse 2: Dawtnak in a khatmi Bawi duhnung te cu vawlei mangbawi Herod nih tei lai phan ah kum thum tang pa ngakchia thisen luanter maw Bawi nunnem a pa vanbawi ve hngal lo in
fields.verse 1: Sualnak in vawleipi cu a hngilh lio ah Pathian nih dawtnak thlaici cu a run tuh cu pangpar cu caw rawlkuang ah a chuak i dawtnak in vawlei dam tertu par a si.
fields.chorus: Dawtnak in vawlei ah a hung parmi Khrih cu kan miphun le chungkhar a dam tertu zong a si thihnak zong a tei i a tho than mi Bawi a si a fale nunnak thar kan ngeih than khawh nakhnga vawlei ah a kheomi van pangpar a si
fields.title: Van Pangpar
fields.ending chorus: Vawlei ah a kheomi van pangpar a si...
fields.verse 3: Vawlei aw na that kho lai lo hrinhniang cu a vengtu van ralkap rel cawklo an si an dawtnak na tang nem ah pom in cohlang zungzal in lawmhnak an petu a si philh hlah

fields.verse 2: Tuukhal ruunrual hna, lung sivang ngai in khuaza ruatin an um lio ah a dawtmi umnak, vawlei ah hin daihnak um seh tiin tuukhal sinah khamhBawi chuahnak a thanhtu cu vanmi an si nauta bik in hrin sihmanhseh, tuukhal hna nih an hngalh zaan-tim dai ah..
fields.verse 1: Van deirel Arfi, kan kaltak hin hlah Jesuh chuahnak kan phak hlan tiang kan hmai ah ceu law, Siangpahrang chuahnak kan phakter tiin mifim hna i lamhruaitu cu, zaan arfi ceu dawh te a si a chuahnak cawkuang sihmanhseh van Arfi nih an hngalh zaan-tim dai ah..
fields.chorus: Zaan Dai, a thiang bik mi zaan kan ca thawngtha bik an phuannak zaan zaan Dai, khuaruahhar bik zaan vancungmi nih hla an sa khamhtu a chuak cang tiin Bawipa an thangthat zaan..
fields.title: Zaan Dai
fields.ending chorus: Ohhow.. Zaan Dai, a thiangbik mi zaan kan ca thawngtha bik an phuannak zaan, zaan Dai, khuaruahhar bik zaan, vancungmi nih hla an sa khamhtu a chuak cang tiin Bawipa an thangthat zaan..
fields.verse 3: A min ah uktu, zungzal hmunmi pa a thawngmi Pathian daihnak Bawi misual a dawtu, a van sunparnak kha kaltak in vawlei cung misual khamhawkah Bethlehem cawkuang cu a thim kan Bawi Jesuh a chuahnak cu, zeizong vialte a daih lio caan a si..

fields.verse 2: Van sunparnak kal tak in misual nang le kei caah sal sinak tu kha ai lak i vailam ah nunnak pek in a kan tlanh riahnak hmun hmanh ngei lo in nauta bik caw rawl kuang ah Van Bawi Siangpahrang fa ve lo bang in hmunkip ah thuh in zam pi tawn hna mu khamhtu Bawi Jesuh cu
fields.verse 1: Khuasik caan a hun chuah cun fing le tlang kip cul in phaizawngpar dawh vialte hna le sermi thil vialte hna lung lawm in mikip thinlung nih hlephlau in hmun kip le ram  kip cul in ro phunkip mei ceu cu vaang in khamhtu Mesiah chuah caan cu lawm in rak don cio tawn hna mu
fields.chorus: A sang bik mi van ah khin Pathian cu sunpar nak hmu ko seh a dawt mi hna um nak vawlei ah remnak le daihnak um hram seh kan khamhtu Jesuh cu chuak cang nihin ah nang le kei caah kan thinlung ah hmunhma pek in dong cio hna u sih
fields.title: Khamhtu A Chuak Cang
fields.verse 3: Vawlei misual a kan dawt cah Pathian si nak kha hlawt in minung bantuk ah  ai cang i kan sin ah minung mui in a hung lang Fapa Jesuh pek kan si i a mim ah Imanuel Pathian kan sin ah a um caah lei vialte nih khamhtu Jesuh cu Bawipa a si an ti lai

fields.verse 5: Vawlei ah daihnak leng ko seh van mi nih zaihla an sa kan ram ah daihnak leng cang seh kan miphun luatnak caah
fields.verse 2: Nang lo cun kan bau ruangmang cang lai maw chialmal chum nih kan hlau hoi lai Christmas thlum chungtling in zaanriah dum than hoi hna lai nang tel lo cun chung pil hnga maw Christmas ah
fields.verse 4: Banh cham ai tiin lung der hlah law temh har ai tiin lung thul hlah law ruahchannak pek ding in nihin kan caah a chuak cang daihnak Pathian nan sin um seh Christmas ah... Christmas lawmhnak.... nan dihlak cung ah um ko seh Christmas lawmhnak...
fields.verse 1: Kiksirsiar zilthlinem sin khamhtu khrih chuahcam sung kan phan lai leeng le vaal rual hna nih kan rak hngahhlang tawn kha zing niceu hung chuah sin ah sunghno nu mit vai tuk ai ee lung kil in hlam ruangmang zingnu sin thlacam mu thawchuah sin ah
fields.title: Christmas Ah
fields.ending chorus:
Nang lo cun kan bau ruangmang cang lai maw chialmal chum nih kan hlau hoi lai Christmas thlum chungtling in zaanriah dum than hoi hna lai nang tel lo cun chung pil hnga maw...


Banh cham ai tiin lung der hlah law temh har ai tiin lung thul hlah law ruahchannak pek ding in nihin kan caah a chuak cang daihnak Pathian nan sin um seh Christmas ah... Christmas lawmhnak.... nan dihlak cung ah um ko seh Christmas lawmhnak...
fields.verse 3: A dai zaan zai hla sin ah thinlung chung a dai kho hrim lo ee ral thuan kar tenh hrat cu hliam sa ko nan hluan ai zil thli te nang vung hrawn law thir tluang bei hmaisuan raltha rual kha ruahchannak pe tu Bawi daihnak Bawi a chuak cang tin vung hlau hna

fields.verse 2: Christmas ni sunglawi ah chungkhar tling lo mi nan um maw harsatnak ruang ah a tap hram mi nan um maw? Nan harnak chung in luatnak nan hmuh cio khawhnak hnga Vanbawi fapa cu nihin kan caah a chuak cang
fields.verse 1: Hlanlio Judea ram i Bethlehem khua ah an cawi hrin hniang nau Messiwh cu an thlim an caah riahnak hmun a um ti lo ruang ah Vanbawi fapa cu cawrawl einak kuang chung ah an thlim
fields.chorus: Christmas lawmhnak le remdaihnak thluachuahnak cu mikip kan cung ah um cio ko seh Vanbawi fa pa cu nihin kan caah a chuak cang
fields.title: Nihin Kan Caah A Chuak Cang
fields.ending chorus:
Christmas lawmhnak le remdaihnak thluachuahnak cu mikip kan cung ah um cio ko seh Vanbawi fa pa cu nihin kan caah a chuak cang 

Happy Merry Christmas To You All
fields.verse 3: Herod bawi siangpahrang nih kum hnih tang ngakchia vial te ka thah dih hna lai tiah nawlbia a pek hna sihmanhseh an hmu kho lo a nu taangnem cung ah Vanmi thiang hna nih Vanbawi fapa cu an rak um pi
Kan hmai ah zeithil dah kan tong lai thei chung zeihmanh kan ngei lo nain Bawipa kut cu kan nih him nak le thluachuah hmuh nak a si fiang tein kan hngalh
fields.verse 4: Emau lei panhmi khualtlawng panih a kal pi tu maw Jesuh Pathian kumthar zalam thluan kan kal pi law kan nun zalam pi a tluang ko lai
fields.verse 1: Kumthar dei ar khuang thawng a thang cang kum hlun aw mangtha law ti in ruah lo le ruah lo kan ruat than cio dawtmi cheukhat kan hmu ti hna lo
fields.chorus: Athar kum aw kan mitthli hnawttu Thlarau thianghlim aw kan kal pi mu zuunngaih puan lu hun piak tu si in thluachuah thar phur tu kum si hram mu kanmah lawng in cun kan kal ngam lo kan kal pi mu kum thluan chuak dih tiang
fields.verse 2: Dawtmi hna he Christmas le Kum thar chung tling te i kan hmang ti lio kha puan bang thar tan e ni hin ni cu biangno mitthli fial lo in zur e
fields.title: Kan Kal Pi Mu

fields.verse 3: Kan hmai ah zei dah um Thai zing ah zeidah kan tong lai ti kan hngalh khawh mi um lo hna mei in a Kal I ruah nak in a vai mi minung menmen kan si ko caah na kut in kan hruai law rili sen na cah bang  kan cah tih nung cu kan cah piak law kan nun zalam tluanter ram hring le din hmun ti pawng ah kan hruai law kan tuu khal tha Jesuh Khirh aw kum lawng thar lo in nun thar in kan hruai hram mu.
fields.verse 1: Ni le thla le maw kum le can cu an liam ee tlai awk le thlah awk le an tha lo lawmh can zong an liam I ngeichiat can zong an liam kan Sian le maw kan Sian lo zong ah harnak kn ti mi le lawmh nak kan ti mi zong ni le thla khua can nih an liam pi a hlun thil vialte cu mang tha ti cang ko hna usih kum thar le thla thar sung lawi kan phan than cang maw a thar kum aw thlachuah thar kan phorh cio mu.
fields.chorus: .Dawt cuk mak mi tam pi Kum nih aliam pi hna ngeichiat nak puan lu he kum thar phan mi u le nau tam pi hna ngeichiat nak puan lu cu hung cang u kum a thar bang in maw thin lung le ruah nak zong hi thar cang seh lawm in hmang than hna u sih.
fields.verse 2: Maw a thar mi kum aw zawt le fah dam lo mi kan caah dam nak thar kan phorh law ngeichiat le lung a kuai mi  caah lung lawm nak thar cu rak kan phorh hram ko mu sung sa tlak a tong mi lei le rai in khat mi kan caah lawm nak thar kan phorh law khua har van sang au in a hrum a ai mi cah le thong thla mi hna cah luatnak le lawmh nak  thar cu kan phorh hram mu kan hngah hlang mi kum thar aw.
fields.title: Kum thar

fields.verse 3: Kum hlun nun kan ruah ah kan cung a tlungmi thil vialte hna cu kirthan umlo in caan nih liampi cang thazaang thar la ding le nunthar thawk ding in Bawipa nih kum thar in a kan don
fields.verse 1: Kum hlun a liam riangmang, kum hlun chung ah kan tonmi vialte le ngaihchiat lawmhnak kan tonmi vialte zong caan sin an liam dih cang hawidawt cheukhat hna nunnak zong kum nih liampi hna ee
fields.chorus: Kum a thar bang kan nun thar chuahthan usih Bawipa dawtnak ruatthan bu in kum thar niceu lawmhnak in hmang cio usih Bawipa nang nih lam kan hruai law zungzal in thluachuahnak kum si ter
fields.verse 2: Kum hlun nan kaltak i kan ruahnak le kan lungput kan zei zong, tharchuah than in remhthan cio hna usih kan nun santlai ding in lunun ngandam kan pe Bawipa lawmhnak kum tha siter
fields.title: Kum Thar In A Kan Don

fields.verse 1: Hi lei ka nun ruah zawnah a caan ah a kha, a caan ah a thlum, siseh dawtu Bawipa nih thachin a kan chiahpiak kha philh hlah
fields.chorus: Mawi Bawipa kan nunnak hi na thladem tangah kan huppheng rihko law... Kut chung na hum van thluachuah rung kan thumh thlak in kan samh piak rih ko law kum thar thluachuah kan nun nih na tha chin kan relnak kum ah kan ser piak in kan lam nang kan hruaithan. .
fields.verse 2: Kum hlun na nun ruatthan hmanh Bawipa a thluachuah thachin relthan hmanh relcawk hnga maw na nun nih hi tluk a tha Bawipa kan caah
fields.title: Kum Thar Thluachuah
fields.ending chorus: Mawi Bawipa kan nunnak hi na thladem tang ah kan huppheng rihko law ... Kut chung na hum van thluachuah rung kan thumh thlak in kan samh piak rih ko law kum thar thluachuah kan nun nih na tha chin kan relnak kum ah kan ser piak in kan lam nang kan hruaithan... Kan serpiak in kan lam nang kan hruaithan.

fields.verse 3: Kan hngalh khawh lomi thaizing kan lamthluan zulh ngam an si lo Bawipa nang tello cun kanmah Lawng in cun kan kal ngamlo ca'h, Bawipa a thawng mi na kut zaa Kan chaanthan law kum thar chungah lam kan hruai ko.
fields.verse 1: Khuacaan reltu suimilam te cu dinh caan ngeilo in ai thawn lengmang tlaihawk thalo in nifa kan nunnak zong duhsahtein caan sinah nikhat hnu nikhat ai thawn lengmang ve zei kar te ko ah khin hen kum caankhat pi na liam manh ee.
fields.chorus: Zeititha maw Kum hlun, liam ai kun law ka nun hlun sining vialte liampi law nithar, zarhthar, thlathar chungah thluachuahthar he Bawipa na velsung cu kan hrawmhthan law kan ton ding kan hngalh khawhlo ca minung sinak lawng cun kan kal ngamlo na thiangthlarau he kumthar kan luhpi ko.
fields.verse 2: Ni le thla Kum caan hna an liam bang Dawtmi cheukhat zong liamser ai hna lileng thlakaam in khua caan kan relnak cu kum hlun nih liampi seh law kum thar ah nunning thar thluachuah thar hna he Bawipa lam Kan hruai than law zungzal in Kan sin ah um ko.
fields.title: Kumthar Chungah Kan Hruai

fields.verse 3: Nile caan hna cu i thleng in, thinghnah thar nih corhthan hna Kumthar sin ah kan lungthar seh, mi kip ca'h thlum-al usi Nehhnu thil ah ngaihchia loin, nithar ca'h thazaang la usih Kumthar ah kan leng cang lai, kumhlun aw mangtha law
fields.verse 1: Tlaih awk thalo nile caan hna, khirhthiam loin an liam e Sung bik cem e caantha hman hi, man ngei in hmang usih Kumhlun liam in kumthar chuak hoi, mi thinlung e hliphlauthan Kan hmancia e maw kum hlun aw, caan sin ah thing riangmang e...
fields.chorus: Lawm cio usih maw Kumthar thluachuah van nitlang seh rualremnak he lungkhat tein, kan khuazung ah, Lai kan rel lai Dawtnak in e..
fields.verse 2: Chungkhar tling le komrual tling in,  kum caan chuah hi sung khun e kan zaatial fek ten tlai in,  Kumthar nithar lawm usih ngaihchiatnak le mitthli vialte, liam serpi law kum hlun aw ka hngah ngan mi sunghlei Kumthar, lawmhnak run kan phurh mu.
fields.title: Kumthar lawm usih
fields.ending chorus:
Lawm cio usih maw Kumthar thluachuah van nitlang seh rualremnak he lungkhat tein, kan khuazung ah, Lai kan rel lai Dawtnak in e..
kan khuazung ah, Lai kan rel lai Dawtnak in e..

fields.verse 3: Kumthar bang nunning thar he kan thazaang tharchuah usih kan Bawipa le ram caah tuan zuamnak lungthin ngei buin kan nun hmang usih.
fields.verse 1:
Kum le caan hna nih an liam thil sining hna zong ai thleng in ruahning le hmuhning zong ai dang a liam cia kan caan chungah chiatnak ton caan zong a um ii thatnak ton caan zong a um ve ngaihchiat caan zong a um ii
Lunglawmh caan zong a umthan hi lei kan nunnak ah thil hlun cu kumhlun nih liam pi seh ruahnak thar le lungthin thar he kumthar dong u sih..
fields.chorus: Kum thar thluachuah tlung ko seh Bawipa dawtmi fa le kan cungah kan ngaihchiatnak puanlu hunpiaktu kan Bawi Jesuh Khrih sawm usih a thlummi kumthar chungah kan nunnak zong Khrih ah thar seh thilhlun vialte lo dih hna seh law hmailei thiltha tu panh zuam in kan nun lamhruaitu tha bik kilvengtu le huhphengtu a kan dawbiktu Bawi Jesuh sawm buin kumthar thluachuah dong usih..
fields.verse 2: Lungthin phurit mi nan um maw? nun beidong mi hna nan um maw? kan thilrit vialte hna cu Jesuh sinah thum usih vanchiat caan zong um hmanhseh kan donghnak a si hrim lai lo harnak kan tonmi hna hi Bawipa bochan zia kan thiamter a sin thlacam mi cu kumthar chungah ruahchannak thar he Jesuh sawm buin kar hlang usih kan nun lamthluan chungah.
fields.title: Kumthar Thluachuah Dong Usih
fields.ending chorus: kumthar thluachuah dong usih..kumthar thluachuah dong usih..

fields.verse 3: Ni le thla kumhlun nih kan dawt mi unau cheukhat le sak hnem tang run nih hna cu kal ve ko hman seh habakuk bang in kumthar ah Bawipa thangthat usih kan cah a remhruat cohlangthiam usih.
fields.verse 4: Maw a thar mi kum aw Damlo ca damnak kan phor law ngeihchia mi hna ca Lawmnak thar cu kan phor law lung a dong mi hna ca ruahchannak thar cu kan phor law Kumthar bang in nun zong thar ve cang seh.
fields.verse 1: Ngaichiat le lungrethei zawt le faknak phun zakip le zatlak khua mui cimnak thlichia le tilet chungin Him le maw dam tein kan hngak hlang kumthar ni ceu dawh le maw thlifim te lawmh in kan phan ee.
fields.chorus: Liam ruangmang cang ko law maw hlun mi kum aw ngeihchiat nak innkaa pi le zatlak damlonak Cu kalpi dih cang law kan hngak hlang mi a thar kum aw thluachuah van ni za thar cu kan phorh mu.
fields.verse 2: Na kan kal pi lo cun kan mah lawngin kan kal ngam lo thlarau thiang hlim in Kumthar cu kan phan pi ko hi vawlei sui le ngun chaw le va he hman ttih nakcun Jesuh nang mah he kum thar hman kan duh.
fields.singer:
Bethsy Hniang, 
Hannah Van Hnem Par
fields.title: Thluachuah Kan Phurh Mu
fields.ending chorus: Mang tha law mang cang law maw kumhlun maw mitthli le maw lungretheihnak vialte liam riangmang cang ko mu kumhlun te..

fields.verse 3: Dam lo mi ca damnak, ngaihchia mi ca  lawmhnak thongtla mi ca luatnak lung kuai mi ca hnemtu le, a thlummi kum si law rim hmuimi kum sihram law kan ca hnangamnak le thluachuah za kan phurhtu kum dawh si hram ko mu.
fields.verse 4: Aw a thar kum aw a rauh hlan ah kum hlun na si than lai, kan phak ding kum thar dang innka chung ah dam tein kan luhpi chungkhar tling in tlawttlaulo tein kan hruai hram mu
fields.verse 1: Zawt le fah dam lonak rai tihnung tam hmanhseh, ka Bawi na kut cak in him tein na ka ven ca'h, ni le thla le kum thar ni ceu a ka phakter i kum hlun cu liam riangmang kum thar thla thar chung ah na kut in na ka hruai
fields.chorus: Mangtha ruangmang law maw a hlun kum aw sungh le zatlaknak le vanchiatnak vialte he liam riangmang cang law maw a thar kum aw thluachuah vanmi za he lawmhnak kan phurh law oh....taksa lei thluachuah lawng si lo thlarau lei thluachuah zong kum thar aw kan phurh law kan mitthli hul cang seh, kan thilrit kan chawng law kum thar bangin nun thar cang seh
fields.verse 2: Na kan kalpi lo cun kan kal ngamlo tiin Moses nih cun a ti, chun ah minmei tom hmang le zaan ah mei ceu hmang in Isreal mi na hruai hna bang na tello cun kum thar kan kal ngam ve lai lo, rak kan kalpi hram mu
fields.singer: Sui Hlawn Rem & Tawk Zi Tial
fields.title: Thluachuah Phurtu Kum
fields.ending chorus: (Kumthar bang in nun thar cang seh)3

fields.verse 3: Thinghnah car lei ah an til thinghnah thar hna an corh than kikzil thli nih a hung hrang ni khua caan nih ni khat hnu ni khat an liam khuasak timhtuahnak caah  tha di zaangba in kan tuan thaal fur khuasik hrial lo in kan nun diriamhnak caah din lo in kan tuan, caan tampi cu hlawhtlinnak a kan petu sertu Pathian hngal lo in kum hlun kan liam
fields.verse 4: Kumthar ah kei ka nunnak uktu Bawi nang rung si ko kum hlun i ka palh sualmi thil vialte kha kum hlun ah ka hlonh piak hram ko lam ding lam hmaan ka hmuhsak hram ka huhphenh ka kil veng hram ka nunnak dihlak in kan ap
fields.verse 1: Thinghnah car lei ah an til thinghnah thar hna an corh than kikzil thli nih a hung hrang ni khua caan nih ni khat hnu ni khat an liam khuasak timhtuahnak caah  tha di zaangba in kan tuan thaal fur khuasik hrial lo in kan nun diriamhnak caah din lo in kan tuan, caan tampi cu hlawhtlinnak a kan petu sertu Pathian hngal lo in kum hlun kan liam
fields.verse 2: Kumthar ah kei ka nunnak uktu Bawi nang rung si ko kum hlun i ka palh sualmi thil vialte kha kum hlun ah ka hlonh piak hram ko lam ding lam hmaan ka hmuhsak hram ka huhphenh ka kil veng hram ka nunnak dihlak in kan ap kum thar ah
fields.title: Kan Ap
fields.ending chorus: Kumthar ah kei ka nunnak uktu Bawi nang rung si ko kum hlun i ka palh sualmi thil vialte kha kum hlun ah ka hlonh piak hram ko lam ding lam hmaan ka hmuhsak hram ka huhphenh ka kil veng hram ka nunnak dihlak in kan ap kumthar ah. ..

fields.verse 3: Hmailei kan nunnak lamthluan Bawipa nang nih kan hruai law na thlarau in kan um pi zawtfah ngaihchiat kan ton caan zong ah kan kal tak hrimhrim hlah nang lawng kan in bochan ko
fields.verse 1: Kum hlun liam riangmang in kum thar ni sunglawi a chuak cang kum hlun dam ten mangtha mu thla dem bang in a liammi ni le thla kum le caan cu tlaih khawhlo in an liam ee
fields.chorus: Bawipa lam hruainak thawng in e kan hmuh ballo kum thar kan phan lamhruaitu Bawi a min thiang cu thangthat in um ko seh kan nunnak zeizong na si
fields.verse 2: Bawi Khrih ah hawikom dawt nang zeitin dah kum thar na don sehtan duhnak si sual maw sehtan duhnak cu thihnak thlarau duhnak cu zungzal nunnak pe tu a si ee
fields.title: Kumthar Kan Phan
fields.ending chorus: Bawipa lam hruainak thawng in e kan hmuh ballo kum thar kan phan lamhruaitu Bawi a min thiang cu thangthat in um ko seh kan nunnak zeizong na si
